story:
Why Presence Pro Care?

Caring for our loved ones is one of the most important things we will ever do. However, being a caregiver can be tough.  Most caregivers live over 100 miles away from the loved one they care for.  On average, professional care services cost between $112 - $205 per day!  As we enter the holiday season and spend time with the people we love, we realize the need for a better solution.

People Power provides the best at-home monitoring solution for caregivers, so they can be connected to the one they care for.  With Presence Pro Care, an aging family member or sick loved one can maintain independence, while caregivers know everything is ok from anywhere in the world.  

Presence Pro Care protects loved ones in multiple ways.  A Caregiver Circle is formed in the app to connect multiple caregivers to the person being cared for.  Wireless activity sensors are unobtrusively placed inside the senior's home, without invading the occupant's privacy and without drilling holes.  Our Ambient Fall Detection system will learn daily living patterns from the activity sensors, to alert both the caregivers and 24/7 emergency response services (U.S. only) if those patterns break unexpectedly.  Ambient Fall Detection analytics are a great backup for the Emergency Button, which can be pressed to call for help directly inside the home.  The connected Pill Dispenser will remind the senior and caregivers when medicine needs to be taken.  Additional home activity and safety sensors act like a security system when no one is home, giving the senior peace of mind when out of the house.

Some caregivers want Internet-connected cameras so they can see and interact with their loved ones directly.  Presence Pro Care has the award-winning best solution for this:  spare smartphones and tablets can be transformed into Presence Cameras!  You gather as many spare smartphones or tablets as you want (with no cellular plan required!), and Presence securely turns them into Internet-connected cameras.  When sitting idle, Presence Cameras will become digital picture frames, allowing caregivers to push and share meaningful memories with the ones they love.


Requirements:

  • The senior's home should have Internet access with a Wi-Fi access point.
  • The caregivers must have a smartphone capable of running the Presence app. Presence is compatible with Android 4.0 and newer, and iOS 6.0 and newer.  Download the app free from the Apple App Store or Google Play.











There are other valuable sensors too.









What's in the Packs?

Presence Pro Care Starter Pack is ideal for independent loved ones in good health who want a little extra support and peace of mind in case of an emergency.  
  • The Emergency Button can be used to call for help while inside the home.
  • Caregivers can optionally transform spare smartphones and tablets into Presence Cameras inside the senior's home, for additional monitoring services.
  • 24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only) with the Pro Care service.


Presence Pro Care Silver Pack is ideal for loved ones who need a bit more help, in smaller homes (under 1,000 square feet / 92 square meters). 
  • 9 sensors total with 7-points of activity sensing with Motion Sensors and Entry Sensors.
  • Capture motion activity sensing in all the common areas of the home, like the bedroom, bathroom, hallway, kitchen, and living room.  Get alerted if daily patterns break unexpectedly (e.g., due to an injury).
  • Detect if any doors open, while home or away.
  • Call for help with the Emergency Button.
  • Get reminders to take medications with the connected Pill Dispenser.
Pro Care Service ($19.99 USD per month not included, no commitment required) includes:
  • 24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only).
  • Ambient Fall Detection analytics.
  • Caregiver alerts and reminders.
  • Caregiver messaging and note taking.
  • Pill Dispenser caregiver reminders.
  • Optional Presence Cameras become digital picture frames with photo sharing.


Presence Pro Care Gold Pack is ideal for average homes (under 2,000 square feet / 185 square meters). 
  • 13 sensors total with 9-points of activity sensing with Motion Sensors, Entry Sensors, and the Touch Sensor.
  • Capture motion activity sensing in all the common areas of the home, like the bedroom, bathroom, hallway, kitchen, and living room.  Get alerted if daily patterns break unexpectedly (e.g., due to an injury).
  • Touch Sensor can be placed on a TV remote control, recliner, or cabinet to learn daily activities.
  • Detect if any doors open, while home or away.
  • Call for help with the Emergency Button.
  • Get reminders to take medications with the connected Pill Dispenser.
  • Detect water leaks - broken hot water heater, dishwasher, washing machine, or forgotten faucet - before they become a costly problem
  • Monitor temperature and comfort, refrigerated medication temperatures, or stovetop cooking problems.

Pro Care Service ($19.99 USD per month not included, no commitment required) includes:

  • 24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only).
  • Ambient Fall Detection analytics.
  • Caregiver alerts and reminders.
  • Caregiver messaging and note taking.
  • Pill Dispenser caregiver reminders.
  • Optional Presence Cameras become digital picture frames with photo sharing.


Presence Pro Care Platinum Pack is ideal for larger homes (greater than 2,000 square feet / 185 square meters). 

  • 22 sensors total with 16-points of activity sensing with Motion Sensors, Entry Sensors, and Touch Sensors.
  • Capture activity sensing in all the common areas of the home, like the bedroom, bathroom, hallway, kitchen, and living room.  Get alerted if daily patterns break unexpectedly (e.g., due to an injury).
  • Detect if any doors open, while home or away.
  • Call for help with the Emergency Button.
  • Get reminders to take medications with the connected Pill Dispenser.
  • Detect water leaks - broken hot water heater, dishwasher, washing machine, or forgotten faucet - before they become a costly problem
  • Monitor temperature and comfort, refrigerated medication temperatures, or stovetop cooking problems.
  • Monitor humidity and comfort.
  • The Touch Sensor can be placed on a TV remote control, recliner, or cabinet to learn daily activities.

Pro Care Service ($19.99 USD per month not included, no commitment required) includes:

  • 24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only).
  • Ambient Fall Detection analytics.
  • Caregiver alerts and reminders.
  • Caregiver messaging and note taking.
  • Pill Dispenser caregiver reminders.
  • Optional Presence Cameras become digital picture frames with photo sharing.

Setup is easy. Staying connected is even easier.

Presence Pro Care is an unobtrusive way to help your loved ones enjoy the comfort of their own home, while still feeling connected and cared for.

People are living longer, and nobody wants to end up in assisted living or a nursing home.  Seniors prefer to stay in the comfort of their own home and maintain their independence and way of life.  As this becomes increasingly difficult with age or chronic illness, seniors need a simple, cost-effective technology solution that can help them and their children, caregivers, and loved ones.

Presence Pro Care offers three main categories of services:

  • Connecting devices that detect emergencies, protect the home, and track medication.
  • Organizing "trusted circles" of caregivers to help those in need.
  • Sharing precious moments with live video calls, photos, and videos through the optional Presence Camera.

Research shows that caregivers can significantly extend and improve their loved one's quality of life by helping them maintain a regimen of eating, sleeping, moving, and taking medications.  You don’t have to do it alone.  Delaying or preventing the move to an assisted living facility can save families hundreds of thousands of dollars.

“Presence has already delivered over 37 million Video Alerts to make homes more safe and secure.  Now we’re asking the user community to help us extend our technology to support one of the greatest challenges facing humanity, which is how to care for the people who cared the most for us,” said Gene Wang, CEO and co-founder of People Power. “The innovative capabilities of Presence Pro Care will enable seniors to maintain independence and extend the quality of life in their own homes, while offering family members and caregivers greater flexibility and peace of mind."


Here's what people have been saying about Presence:



FAQ

Q: How do I talk with my loved one about installing a solution like Presence Pro Care?  
A: We know firsthand that having this conversation with your aging loved ones can be awkward and difficult.  Presence Pro Care doubles as a security system for the home, and this is how most beta users framed it for their loved ones.

As a modern security system, Presence will protect your home while you're out and about.  On top of this cutting-edge security system, seniors will be interested in the fact that Presence Pro Care adds a connected pill dispenser, an emergency response button, and 24/7 professional monitoring for protection, without sacrificing privacy.

Q: How easy is it to install Presence Pro Care?
A: Extremely easy.

  1. Download the Presence app to your smartphone and sign in.
  2. Tap the "Add Device" button and scan the QR code on the back of your gateway.  Plug your gateway in to ethernet and USB power.  A video plays in the app showing what to do next, while the gateway automatically enters pairing mode.
  3. Pull the battery tab on a sensor and wait for 10 seconds.  The sensor will pair automatically to the gateway.  You will be asked what the sensor will be used for, and the app will guide you through the installation process.
  4. Peel off the sticky backing on the sensor and place the sensor where you want it to go.

Q: How many sensors can a single gateway support?
A: 25

Q: How many caregivers can I invite to my caregiver network?
A: Unlimited.

Q: How do the Ambient Fall Detection analytics work?
A:  Presence Pro Care uses data from the motion, touch, and entry sensors to detect occupant activity and location information over time.  The system uses this data to learn the activity patterns of the occupant.  Anomalous periods of inactivity may trigger an alert to caregivers and professional monitoring services, as this may indicate that an accident (e.g., a fall) has occurred.  With Presence Pro Care, these Ambient Fall Detection analytics serve as a safety net in case the senior cannot reach the Emergency Button or a phone to call for help.

Q: How does the 24/7 professional monitoring work?
A:  When Presence Pro Care detects something in the home that looks like a serious problem, the caregivers and professional monitoring service are contacted.  The professional monitoring service will notify a call tree of people you provide in the app, and if the problem can't be resolved directly, local emergency services will be notified.

Q: Can I add multiple gateways to my home?
A: Absolutely.  Your Presence app supports unlimited devices and gateways.

Q: Can you add ZigBee or Z-Wave Sensors, or just "Presence" Sensors?
A: The current gateway supports ZigBee Green Power and ZigBee Home Automation, and can connect many different types of devices that already exist in the market.  The Presence user interface and rules are layered on top of those devices, so new devices are usually brought into the app under careful quality assurance to offer the best experience for our users.  The Presence app and the cloud software that powers it connect to many other devices, clouds, and protocols.

Q: What is the wireless range of the sensors?
A: Our range testing shows about 2-3x the performance of WiFi.  We are consistently seeing about 130+ feet indoors, through 4 walls.  In the same test, WiFi connected about 30-60 feet through 2 walls.

Q: What is the lifetime of the batteries? What type of batteries? Does the motion sensor need to be connected to a power source?
A: The sensors are extremely low power and are expected to last 2 to 5 years on batteries, depending on use.  Most sensors use a CR2032 Lithium coin cell battery, which makes them small and unobtrusive.  This battery has a shelf life of 10+ years. The motion sensor uses 2 AA batteries.

See http://www.edn.com/design/power-management/4421334/2/Long-Live-Coin-Cells--Getting-years-of-battery-life-from-small-batteries-in-low-power-devices

Q: Will I be able to purchase individual sensors?
A: Yes.  We will be offering sensors for individual purchase on the Presence store at http://presencepro.com/store.

Q: Can the Presence app installed on your primary phone detect when you leave the house and automatically arm all the sensors?
A: Yes, geofencing will enable Presence to detect when you're Home, Away, or on Vacation.

Q: I'm a developer. Can I connect my own gadgets to Presence?
A: Absolutely.  Sign up at http://fabrux.peoplepowerco.com to learn how to connect your own devices into Presence, and customize your own device UI's. Connectivity is free for developers and manufacturers.

Q: When are you shipping?
A: We're currently on schedule for delivery in May 2016.



Presence Pro Care:  

Helping caregivers support their loved ones.
story_txt:
Why Presence Pro Care?


Caring for our loved ones is one of the most important things we will ever do. However, being a caregiver can be tough.  Most caregivers live over 100 miles away from the loved one they care for.  On average, professional care services cost between $112 - $205 per day!  As we enter the holiday season and spend time with the people we love, we realize the need for a better solution.

Caregivers can optionally transform spare smartphones and tablets into Presence Cameras inside the senior's home, for additional monitoring services.
24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only) with the Pro Care service.





Presence Pro Care Silver Pack is ideal for loved ones who need a bit more help, in smaller homes (under 1,000 square feet / 92 square meters). 

9 sensors total with 7-points of activity sensing with Motion Sensors and Entry Sensors.

Capture motion activity sensing in all the common areas of the home, like the bedroom, bathroom, hallway, kitchen, and living room.  Get alerted if daily patterns break unexpectedly (e.g., due to an injury).

Detect if any doors open, while home or away.
Call for help with the Emergency Button.
Get reminders to take medications with the connected Pill Dispenser.

Pro Care Service ($19.99 USD per month not included, no commitment required) includes:

24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only).
Ambient Fall Detection analytics.
Caregiver alerts and reminders.
Caregiver messaging and note taking.
Pill Dispenser caregiver reminders.
Optional Presence Cameras become digital picture frames with photo sharing.






Presence Pro Care Gold Pack is ideal for average homes (under 2,000 square feet / 185 square meters). 



13 sensors total with 9-points of activity sensing with Motion Sensors, Entry Sensors, and the Touch Sensor.
Capture motion activity sensing in all the common areas of the home, like the bedroom, bathroom, hallway, kitchen, and living room.  Get alerted if daily patterns break unexpectedly (e.g., due to an injury).
Touch Sensor can be placed on a TV remote control, recliner, or cabinet to learn daily activities.
Detect if any doors open, while home or away.
Call for help with the Emergency Button.
Get reminders to take medications with the connected Pill Dispenser.
Detect water leaks - broken hot water heater, dishwasher, washing machine, or forgotten faucet - before they become a costly problem

Monitor temperature and comfort, refrigerated medication temperatures, or stovetop cooking problems.



Pro Care Service ($19.99 USD per month not included, no commitment required) includes:

24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only).
Ambient Fall Detection analytics.
Caregiver alerts and reminders.
Caregiver messaging and note taking.
Pill Dispenser caregiver reminders.
Optional Presence Cameras become digital picture frames with photo sharing.






Presence Pro Care Platinum Pack is ideal for larger homes (greater than 2,000 square feet / 185 square meters). 



22 sensors total with 16-points of activity sensing with Motion Sensors, Entry Sensors, and Touch Sensors.
Capture activity sensing in all the common areas of the home, like the bedroom, bathroom, hallway, kitchen, and living room.  Get alerted if daily patterns break unexpectedly (e.g., due to an injury).
Detect if any doors open, while home or away.
Call for help with the Emergency Button.
Get reminders to take medications with the connected Pill Dispenser.
Detect water leaks - broken hot water heater, dishwasher, washing machine, or forgotten faucet - before they become a costly problem
Monitor temperature and comfort, refrigerated medication temperatures, or stovetop cooking problems.
Monitor humidity and comfort.
The Touch Sensor can be placed on a TV remote control, recliner, or cabinet to learn daily activities.


Pro Care Service ($19.99 USD per month not included, no commitment required) includes:

24/7 professional monitoring (U.S. only).
Ambient Fall Detection analytics.
Caregiver alerts and reminders.
Caregiver messaging and note taking.
Pill Dispenser caregiver reminders.
Optional Presence Cameras become digital picture frames with photo sharing.






Setup is easy. Staying connected is even easier.

Presence Pro Care is an unobtrusive way to help your loved ones enjoy the comfort of their own home, while still feeling connected and cared for.
People are living longer, and nobody wants to end up in assisted living or a nursing home.  Seniors prefer to stay in the comfort of their own home and maintain their independence and way of life.  As this becomes increasingly difficult with age or chronic illness, seniors need a simple, cost-effective technology solution that can help them and their children, caregivers, and loved ones.
Presence Pro Care offers three main categories of services:

Connecting devices that detect emergencies, protect the home, and track medication.
Organizing "trusted circles" of caregivers to help those in need.
Sharing precious moments with live video calls, photos, and videos through the optional Presence Camera.

Research shows that caregivers can significantly extend and improve their loved one's quality of life by helping them maintain a regimen of eating, sleeping, moving, and taking medications.  You don’t have to do it alone.  Delaying or preventing the move to an assisted living facility can save families hundreds of thousands of dollars.
“Presence has already delivered over 37 million Video Alerts to make homes more safe and secure.  Now we’re asking the user community to help us extend our technology to support one of the greatest challenges facing humanity, which is how to care for the people who cared the most for us,” said Gene Wang, CEO and co-founder of People Power. “The innovative capabilities of Presence Pro Care will enable seniors to maintain independence and extend the quality of life in their own homes, while offering family members and caregivers greater flexibility and peace of mind."

Here's what people have been saying about Presence:














FAQ
Q: How do I talk with my loved one about installing a solution like Presence Pro Care?  A: We know firsthand that having this conversation with your aging loved ones can be awkward and difficult.  Presence Pro Care doubles as a security system for the home, and this is how most beta users framed it for their loved ones.
As a modern security system, Presence will protect your home while you're out and about.  On top of this cutting-edge security system, seniors will be interested in the fact that Presence Pro Care adds a connected pill dispenser, an emergency response button, and 24/7 professional monitoring for protection, without sacrificing privacy.
Q: How easy is it to install Presence Pro Care?A: Extremely easy.

Download the Presence app to your smartphone and sign in.
Tap the "Add Device" button and scan the QR code on the back of your gateway.  Plug your gateway in to ethernet and USB power.  A video plays in the app showing what to do next, while the gateway automatically enters pairing mode.
Pull the battery tab on a sensor and wait for 10 seconds.  The sensor will pair automatically to the gateway.  You will be asked what the sensor will be used for, and the app will guide you through the installation process.
Peel off the sticky backing on the sensor and place the sensor where you want it to go.

Q: How many sensors can a single gateway support?A: 25
Q: How many caregivers can I invite to my caregiver network?A: Unlimited.
Q: How do the Ambient Fall Detection analytics work?A:  Presence Pro Care uses data from the motion, touch, and entry sensors to detect occupant activity and location information over time.  The system uses this data to learn the activity patterns of the occupant.  Anomalous periods of inactivity may trigger an alert to caregivers and professional monitoring services, as this may indicate that an accident (e.g., a fall) has occurred.  With Presence Pro Care, these Ambient Fall Detection analytics serve as a safety net in case the senior cannot reach the Emergency Button or a phone to call for help.
Q: How does the 24/7 professional monitoring work?A:  When Presence Pro Care detects something in the home that looks like a serious problem, the caregivers and professional monitoring service are contacted.  The professional monitoring service will notify a call tree of people you provide in the app, and if the problem can't be resolved directly, local emergency services will be notified.
Q: Can I add multiple gateways to my home?A: Absolutely.  Your Presence app supports unlimited devices and gateways.
Q: Can you add ZigBee or Z-Wave Sensors, or just "Presence" Sensors?A: The current gateway supports ZigBee Green Power and ZigBee Home Automation, and can connect many different types of devices that already exist in the market.  The Presence user interface and rules are layered on top of those devices, so new devices are usually brought into the app under careful quality assurance to offer the best experience for our users.  The Presence app and the cloud software that powers it connect to many other devices, clouds, and protocols.
Q: What is the wireless range of the sensors?A: Our range testing shows about 2-3x the performance of WiFi.  We are consistently seeing about 130+ feet indoors, through 4 walls.  In the same test, WiFi connected about 30-60 feet through 2 walls.
Q: What is the lifetime of the batteries? What type of batteries? Does the motion sensor need to be connected to a power source?A: The sensors are extremely low power and are expected to last 2 to 5 years on batteries, depending on use.  Most sensors use a CR2032 Lithium coin cell battery, which makes them small and unobtrusive.  This battery has a shelf life of 10+ years. The motion sensor uses 2 AA batteries.
See http://www.edn.com/design/power-management/4421334/2/Long-Live-Coin-Cells--Getting-years-of-battery-life-from-small-batteries-in-low-power-devices
Q: Will I be able to purchase individual sensors?A: Yes.  We will be offering sensors for individual purchase on the Presence store at http://presencepro.com/store.
Q: Can the Presence app installed on your primary phone detect when you leave the house and automatically arm all the sensors?A: Yes, geofencing will enable Presence to detect when you're Home, Away, or on Vacation.
Q: I'm a developer. Can I connect my own gadgets to Presence?A: Absolutely.  Sign up at http://fabrux.peoplepowerco.com to learn how to connect your own devices into Presence, and customize your own device UI's. Connectivity is free for developers and manufacturers.


Q: When are you shipping?A: We're currently on schedule for delivery in May 2016.



Presence Pro Care:  
Helping caregivers support their loved ones.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ashraf Abuleil, but you can call me “Ash”.  I am a young entrepreneur with a passion for fitness and nutrition.  Soccer was my game.  At a very young age, and at a very early stage in my athletic development, I learned and understood the impact of food on my physical and mental performance.  My game was stronger when my food was better!  My teammates and my coaches noticed the improvements and became intrigued.  How was I improving so fast?  And, that's how my interest in the world of nutrition started.  I have been sharing my experience from the last 20 year to help shape and grow a healthier generation. 

In 2007, I opened my first nutrition store and named it Got Muscle.  We just celebrated our 10 year anniversary!  But, my dream has always been to cover an entire community with the positive benefits of good, supportive healthy eating.  Along the way, I became aware of the substandard supplements and products that were being pushed to the athletic community, young and old alike.  I found my purpose and set out to fulfill my dream. 

I FINALLY opened the doors to Organic Muscle in February 2017 after a very expensive, finger-biting, hair-pulling 9-month delay caused by changes in the zoning and approval process. What a nightmare!  Did I mention “EXPENSIVE?”  I had to constantly remind myself of my favorite quote, “If your dreams don’t scare you, they’re not BIG enough!”

We are now open, we are now serving and our customers love us!  And to keep moving forward we need your help!  We are behind in our rent because it took so long to open our doors and now we must catch up with our bills. We are in the process of bringing all our accounts up-to-date so that all our focus is on bringing all our amazing product ideas to our customers.

This campaign is focused on enhancing our services, enhancing our product line, and bringing brand awareness of our unique concepts.  

Contributions will help us launch a farm-to-table meal plan, buy the proper equipment for our new products, and the needed fixtures and furniture to complete the vision.

What We Need & What You Get

$215,000 Campaign goal

  • $65,000 Landlord behind on rent
  • $35,000 New Product 
  • $30,000 Marketing & website development
  • $20,000 Improvement 
  • $30,000  6 month Manager position
  • $20,000 1 Walk-in Refrigerator
  • $15,000 1 Display Fridge
  • $6,000 Chocolate Tempering Machine

Our perks include the following:

  • Hand-made vegan, organic chocolate bonbons,
  • Customized supplements plans,
  • Customized nutrition plans,
  • Customized supplements counseling,
  • Custom designed Organic Muscle inspirational t-shirts,
  • Gift cards.
  • If we don't reach the entire goal, all funds contributed will go toward past rent.  

The Impact

  • This campaign is focused on stabilizing and growing Organic Muscle's contribution to Los Angeles and surrounding communities.  With your help, we plan to bring awareness of nutrition through education to build a healthier, more integrated organic community.
  • Organic Muscle is my third business.  The most important lesson I have learned is to never, ever give up or back away from a problem. 

One last thing…

Every time I feel down, really down, the first thing I do is call my mother ... Hearing her voice calms my heart beat, and bring peace to my world.  Always before I hang up, I always ask my mother to pray for me.   

Thank you 

~Ash

T-shirts

Staff

Chocolate

Food products

New Freezer

New Fridge

New tables & chairs

Etc…

  • Our plan to open the store was significantly delayed for nine months.  Changes in the zoning process delayed the store opening for longer than we had originally anticipated.  This created a major problem with the landlord.
  • This campaign is focused on enhancing our services, product line, and brand awareness.  
  • Contributions will help us launch a farm-to-table meal plan, fixtures and furniture and equipment, staffing.

  • $65,000 Landlord behind on rent
  • $35,000 New Product 
  • $15,000 Marketing
  • $15,000 Improvement 
  • $30,000  6 month Manager position
  • $20,000 1 Walk-in Refrigerator
  • $15,000 1 Display Fridge

  •

  • If we don't reach the entire goal, all funds contributed will go toward past rent.  

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • This campaign is focused on stabilizing Organic Muscle's contribution to the Los Angeles community.  We hope to bring awareness of nutrition through education to build a healthier, integrated community.   
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Organic Muscle is my third business. 
  • Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • I don't back away from a problem. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every time I feel down, really down, the first thing I do is call my mother ... Hearing her voice calms my heart beat, and bring peace to my world.  Always before I hang up, I always ask my mother to pray for me .   

I want money but love a prayer.  

Thank you 

~Ash

story:
Short Summary

Hi My Name is Rob i'm the owner of Tranzmission Planet Radio. Ive spent the last 12 years working in the broadcasting industry in both corporate radio and for the last 4 years as the operator of a community run internet radio station. What we're trying to accomplish at Tramzmission Planet is to create a platform of discovery and promotion thats free for unsigned musicians and independent labels.We believe that the heart and soul of the music industry is the innovative music that comes from the Indie community. With your help we can build this platform and community to help expose and promote all the great music that gets ignored or under played by other broadcasters. With your help we can build this and ensure that there will always be a home and a voice for the indie music community.

What We Need & What You Get

At Tranzmission Planet we try to utilize as much free technology as we can to create our platform but unfortunatley for as "thrifty" as we try to be things just cost money.

The money we raise will help us purchase new (or refurbished to save money) computers as well as the broadcasting sofware we use to create what we hope will be some entertaining and engageing programming. We try to recycle as much technology as we can to save money but unfortunately the things we cant get cheaply are also the things that are vital for us to broadcast our stations, Money raised will also be used to help pay for our operational costs like the internet and our electric. In addition to the things listed above we will need to promote our station and  like our love of free technology we love free promotion but we will have to spend some money to promote ourselves (and by default Indie music) effectively. We are currently operating in a borrowed unheated attic (play sad violin music here) eventually we would like to move into a small rental space so the money raised now will help to expedite that goal. Finally every dollar we raise helps us to launch new stations so we can create new genre based channels to better promote the indie music community.

PERKS!

Every person who contribute will be put on our WALL OF FAME on our website so you will always be on the roster of people who support us and the indie music you love. For everybody who donates $25 or more we also have stickers. If you donate more money we will record you so we can put your voice into our programming as a "liner" or maybe you want to sponsor our programming for $500 we will create "your name presents" programming, this is a great way to get some low dollar promotions for you, your business or organization.

Our Goal is 15 thousand dollars but all money raised immediatly goes to getting as many stations on the air as we can, No money raised will be used to buy unnessary equipment or be used for "payroll".

The Impact

We want to launch our First station on January 1st 2013 so we can kick off the new year with some great music. By having a Radio Network that plays Indie music exclusivley we hope that helps to level the playing field so that smaller indie labels and unsigned musicians have a dedicated service to help them promote themselves and grow their fanbase. Indie music and indie broadcasting need each other so this is our part to further the cause.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that money is tight but if you want to help us create this platform of discovery help us promote Tranzmission Planet Radio. We have a Facebook community in place to help promote us as well as any projects you are working on or maybe you can tell any musicians you know to submit their music to us so we can get it on the air.

Dont forget Indiegogo has some great tools to help "share" us across the internet.

Thank you so much for helping us out. Please check out our Facebook page(s) and our Website for more information.

Every person who contribute will be put on our WALL OF FAME on our website so you will always be on the roster of people who support us and the indie music you love. For everybody who donates $25 or more we also have stickers. If you donate more money we will record you so we can put your voice into our programming as a "liner" or maybe you want to sponsor our programming for $500 we will create "your name presents" programming, this is a great way to get some low dollar promotions for you, your business or organization.
Our Goal is 15 thousand dollars but all money raised immediatly goes to getting as many stations on the air as we can, No money raised will be used to buy unnessary equipment or be used for "payroll".


The Impact
We want to launch our First station on January 1st 2013 so we can kick off the new year with some great music. By having a Radio Network that plays Indie music exclusivley we hope that helps to level the playing field so that smaller indie labels and unsigned musicians have a dedicated service to help them promote themselves and grow their fanbase. Indie music and indie broadcasting need each other so this is our part to further the cause.


Other Ways You Can Help
We know that money is tight but if you want to help us create this platform of discovery help us promote Tranzmission Planet Radio. We have a Facebook community in place to help promote us as well as any projects you are working on or maybe you can tell any musicians you know to submit their music to us so we can get it on the air.
Dont forget Indiegogo has some great tools to help "share" us across the internet.
Thank you so much for helping us out. Please check out our Facebook page(s) and our Website for more information.

story:
HELP SAVE OUR MULTI GENERATIONAL PROPERTY

 

John Keto was raised on a farm near Lake Sylvia. He knew that he wanted to one day own a piece of land there. In the early 1930’s that dream was realized. John, his wife Vera, their four and later five children bought their own little slice of heaven on the lake and it has become a legacy to pass on through the generations.

In 1935 they started building a small cabin and later a year round home for them to enjoy their golden years. For Great Grandpa “Jack”, time was short there at the lake, but his presence remains in the cabin, house and metal benches on the property.  Family members continue to enjoy the time they spend there and have precious memories to share with new children, hearing the stories of the lake and creating their own. Vera continued to live there for many wonderful years until her passing. During this time the family would gather for weekends, holidays or just to visit our beloved matriarch.

Patsy (one of John and Vera’s daughter’s) acquired the lake property and spent many wonderful years there with her children and grandchildren in much the same way as her mother. Three years ago Patsy was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer and passed away a short time after. With little time to make arrangements for the property a basic will left her grown children responsible for the remaining debt. After making the house payments for the past two years the savings have run out.

With so many family members wanting to hold on to this property for continuing generations to enjoy, but almost all with their own financial hardships; we are short on the amount owed to the bank. This is where we are pleading with you and your generosity to help us hold on to this land, our heritage. The total amount owed to the bank is $360,000. We are hoping to raise at least $150,000 in order to collaborate with other family members, but any amount we raise will ensure a share to help save the land. Thank you for your generosity in helping us save this precious family property!

story:
Dear Patron:

A New Beginning Foster Family Agency is a 501C3 Non-Profit California Corporation that was established five years ago. The Agency serves the needs of abused and neglected children that are adjudicated as Dependents of the Juvenile Court from San Bernardino and Riverside Counties. Foster children of all ages from ages from birth to twenty-one. The Agency's specialty is the focus on teens including the following: Child Abuse (Physical, Sexual and Emotional), Neglect, Abandonment, or come from families where Substance Abuse and incarceration is commonplace.

The Agency would like to request your help for our foster children by asking you and/or your company to give a donation. Your contribution of just $5, $10, $20 or more will help foster children. Donations of clothing, baby items, educational toys, electronic games, books, school supplies, gift certificates, computers, financial donations, etc., are also welcomed. All donations made to the Agency on behalf of the foster children are Tax Deductible and the Agency provides you and/or your company with an official receipt letter. The Agency will list the names of everyone who donated in the Annual Christmas Party’s Program Guide.

The Agency’s focus is teenagers and teenage mothers/fathers. The Agency focuses on teenagers because most teenagers in Foster Care are not reunified with their families due to their families not completing their court ordered Treatment Plan. At times, extended family members are able to have the foster children placed with them, but some foster children cannot be placed with extended family members due to the extended family members either not being able to pass the required background check or they don’t have the financial means to care for the foster children. As a result, many foster children end up remaining in the Agency until they are eighteen or nineteen years-old (foster children who have not finished high school can remain in Foster Care until they are nineteen years-old).

 

Initially, when children are placed into Foster Care, it is under a case plan of Reunification and their families have approximately a year and a half to complete their court ordered Treatment Plan. The Agency provides trained supervised visitation monitors for court ordered visits at the Agency, Children and Family Services, at a park or a restaurant. During the Reunification process, if the families do not complete their court ordered Treatment Plan within the time limit, the case plan may be changed either to Legal Guardianship, Adoption or Non Relative Placement. All Certified Foster Parents in the Agency are given the first choice of having the foster children permanently remain in their home under one of these case plans when this occurs. Over the past five years, several of the Certified Foster Parents in the Agency have become Legal Guardians, Adoptive Parents and Non Relative Placement Parents over the past four years and have provided nurturing and caring homes for many foster children of all ages, especially teenagers.

The Agency is committed toward providing the necessary services and activities needed for the foster children in placement. The services provided include Tutoring, College Preparation, Independent Living Program, Process Groups, Anger Management Classes, Teen Parenting Classes, Substance Abuse Classes, Therapy and Crisis Intervention. The Agency provides clothing for all foster children placed; as most often; the foster children are placed with only the clothing they are wearing at the time. The Agency provides transportation to and from court hearings and visits. The Agency gives $200 to foster children who graduate from High School and help with submitting paperwork for college grants and scholarships. There have been several foster children who went on to college and vocational schools, as well as securing jobs in the community. The Agency also provides an Annual Summer activity, with the input of the foster children (where they want to go and what they would like to do), an Annual Thanksgiving Dinner in which the foster children and their biological parents have a formal dinner and celebrate and an Annual Christmas party in which, the foster children dress in formal wear and invite their families to sit down dinner, so that they can celebrate Christmas with them and the Agency provides all of the food, music and gifts. The services provided are educational and recreational, so that all foster children can be taught appropriate social and coping skills necessary to lead normal healthy lives, even though they are removed from their families and placed into Foster Care.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at the numbers listed above or on my cell phone: 760-508-3629. Thank you for your time, consideration and support.

Sincerely,

Suzette Mohammed, Psy.D.
Administrator/Executive Director     
  

Please Donate Now!

        You may donate by mail and send your check to:
        A New Beginning Inc.
        16377 Main St., Unit A
        Hesperia, CA 92345

        Or you may use PayPal
            
 
 
 
 

               A New Beginning Foster Family Agency

 

                                16377 Main St., Unit A Hesperia, CA 92345

                                   Bus:760-244-8337 Fax: 760-244-8099

                                  www.anbffa.com   anbffa@yahoo.com               

We are establish to provide comprehensive services to dependent children of the Juvenile Court placed into Foster Care. This program focuses on "Helping to rebulid the lives our children" in the community. A New Beginning FFA will provide the care,  supervision, and ensure the well being of the foster children . We also provides the necessary needs and services that are individualized to meet the needs of each foster child placed with our Agency.

A New Beginning FFA works with the issues of the foster children and utilizes an individualized Treatment Plan according to the foster child's educational, emotional and physical needs ensuring the child's correct placement into the Agency. It is hoped that these services will afford these children with the opportunity to gain a greater understanding. In order to accomplish this task, the Agency will insure that in addition to the other services provided to those children in placement, that all children placed receive on-going training. Some methods utilized to accomplish the Agency's purpose include:

  • Trained Foster Agency personnel
  • Supervision of all Placed children
  • Medical staff will be made available as needed
  • The utilization of the community resources to further support and enhance the learning provided to those placed.

In order to ensure the proper care of all foster children A New Beginning FFA's foster children will receive Tutoring , Anger Mangement Classes, Teen Parenting Classes, Therapeutic Services, Medical and Dental Services as needed. Services are provided by the Agency Staff and /or outsourcing to the Community. A New Beginning FFA provides care, supervision and on-going educational and therapeutic services to meet the individual needs of each foster child placed with the Agency. The purpose of this Agency is to "Rebulid the Lives of Our Children" in the community, so that a solid foundation is formed when the foster children transition out of Foster-Care.

it is our goal to continue to provide each child in placement with a continuity of Care, Nurture and Services, which will meet their individualized needs as well as the needs of their biological famlies.

The methods used to accomplish the Agency's purpose are utilized through the use of goal oriented Professional Services designed to provide a level of care commensurate with the needs and psychosocial development of each foster child placed within the Agency.

These services are provided through and by: 

  • Training applicants to be qualifed Certified Foster Parents. 
  • The appropriate placement or "match" of foster children with with Certified foster Parents. 
  • The provision of On-going Professional Services that are specific to the Individual Care, Supervision, Treatment and Developmental needs of the Foster Care.
  •  Psychological/Psycho-Education Testing.
  •  Preparation for Independent Living transitioning out of Foster Care. 
  •  Tutoring Services at the Agency's Learning Center. 
  •  Certified Foster Parent Support Group.  
  •  24 Hour Support Services.

The Goal of A New Beginning FFA is to provide a heathy environment that facilitates growth and development for each foster child. 

                                              Board of Directors

Suzette Mohammed, Psy,D                                                    President/CEO

Dennis Brue                                                                                    Treasurer

Claudia Robinson                                                                            Secretary

story:
What is the back story to Geek Out (Maid & Cosplay) Cafe?

I'm a young geek girl who is very passionate about a ton of things. Cosplay, food, and community. I was raised with Star Wars, Star Trek, Pokemon, Dragon Ball Z, computers, Mario, Nintendo, Play Station. Anything of that caliber has always been a HUGE part of my life. I came up with the idea for a cosplay cafe one day, when I was thinking about the perfect place to eat. The perfect place for geeks to eat. Somewhere they can pull out their Magic cards, and have a match. A place they can safely LARP (which is live-action roleplaying), without the judgmental eyes of others. 


Or maybe just a place that served delicious food to a few individuals who wanted a super awesome dining experience. I want to bring together the community with something everyone can enjoy, whether or not they indulge in hobbies of the nerdy kind. I want a place that a customer can walk into, and feel welcomed, and loved. 


But what is cosplay? And what is a "maid cafe"?

 Cosplay is shortened term for "costume play", considered a theatre art where people wear costumes and accessories to represent a certain character from a variety of sources (books, comics, tv shows, manga, anime, etc).


A maid cafe is technically a cosplay themed restaurant, where the employees dress in elegant maid uniforms and butler garb. The whole idea behind it is to create a different kind of atmosphere, that you usually do not see that often in American dining. The employees interact with the guests in a friendly manner, and they play board games with them, or just discuss anything that could be recent news of interest to the guest. 


What makes this so much different from the next cafe?

Geek Out Cafe isn't just my dream. It's every single person who has always just wanted a place to belong's dream. I want to reach out to my local community, and help people get recognized for their talents. It would feature art from local artists, the music playing in the background would be that from a band that usually played only in their garage. 


We would soon feature an after school program, to help get children off the streets and doing something positive. I myself, love children, they are our future generation, and they need to be nurtured and nourished, so they grow. Every week we would feature or highlight an activity, idea, thought, a dream, whatever the case, and learn more about it. Sometimes, people would come in and do guest-speaking. If you're a con goer and enjoy panels, think of it like that. A lot of hands on learning that not only gives your children something to do for an afternoon, is fun for adults as well.


On weekends, for dinner, we would throw on short skits/shows for entertainment with help from the local thespians.


I plan to cater to everyone-- be it vegans, vegetarians, and people with allergies. I plan to buy local, support local, and never accept less than the best.

The Impact

My small community of people, consisting of the nerdy bookworm, the socially awkward video gamer, the kid who wears wild wigs to school-- they all need a place to go, where they can feel safe, and not judged by the rest of society. I've discussed this with a lot of people, and everyone is already backing me 100%. To see this happen, would just be such a dream come true. I would like to hope, that Geek Out Cafe can bring the people of my city/surrounding areas come together, the way it should be.


If we can make this happen, I would be sure that I gave back to the community 110%. Donating to charities, schools,and hospitals would only just be the start, and it would just increase as Geek Out Cafe increased. 


What We Need & What You Get

I would like to raise at least 5,000 dollars. This would cover the basics. Kitchen equipment (the stove and fridge I am looking at are about 1,000 right there) A first month's rent(another 1k), business permit and licensing fees(about 500$) food supplies (ranging from 500$+) and any other small kind of purchases needed to get this on the road. If my goal is not reached, the money will still be used to kick start Geek Out Cafe gear, and going into a savings fund. Geek Out Cafe is going to happen, no matter how long it takes! I am certain of this. 


I've already explained what Geek Out Cafe is, but by helping make it happen, you get some cool stuff too! Tees, bags, bracelets, comic books, you know, cool stuff. :D


Other Ways You Can Help

I know the times are hard, but if you don't have A LOT of extra money floating around in your pocket, a dollar goes a long way. If 5,000 people just donate, ONE DOLLAR, we can make this happen. Skip the Mickey D's Sweet Tea just this once (I know, we love their Sweet Tea), and put it to a slightly better cause (even though your thirst is important too). 


I know a lot of people have huge doubts in this, in me. And I really need some supporters and funders to prove everyone wrong. Remember, this isn't just about me. It's about all of us. So maybe if you know some cool cats who love helping out the little guy, write on their facebook, send them an email, and maybe even tell them about Geek Out Cafe and why they donate to such a great cause like this one.


Every little bit counts, and without you guys, we can't make this happen. Thank you, thank you, so much for every little donation.

story:
Our Experience

For the last 20 years, my brother Matt and I have lived in the greater Grand Rapids area, enjoying what this "best kept secret" of a city has to offer.  Now it's time to give back to the place that has for so long enriched our lives.  Here's how, with a little back story to go with it.

In the summer of 2007, we spent a majority of our time heavily involved in the pomp and circumstance of friends and loved ones getting married.  I can think of a whole list of adjectives to describe that promise those people make to each other before God.

How about Exciting?  Perhaps terrifying.  Uplifting, encouraging, emotional, heartfelt, wondrous!  The list goes on.  With each wedding came a recurring observation made by my brother Matt and I.  If this day is so highly valued.  If this moment is so connected with who we are and who we are to become...then this day must happen in a place worthy of its grandeur.

Time and time again we spoke with people who were frustrated by the lack of unique venues in Grand Rapids.  People want to break free from these places that haven't changed their formula in a decade.  They want a place that breaks the mold.


Having been in the DJ business and wedding industry for over a decade; many clients told us they wanted more in a venue. We set out to build something that reignites the excitement and pride of a wedding day; or any event for that matter.

Something that elevates the standard of excellence.  A place with a purpose to beautify West Michigan.

Brixton Way is a dream formed from years of research and development in events and ceremony services.  It will be an indoor and outdoor events center that will be unmatched in beauty and elegance.  We are redefining what an event center is.  We are offering to construct a place worthy of your day. Join with us in this dream. 

Help us re-define elegance.


Okay, the quick synopsis:

Brixton Way is, first and foremost, a multi-purpose outdoor event center catering specifically to guests with parties of 250 guests or less.  This is the venue for social gatherings, community events, family reunions, Wedding receptions/ceremonies, company gatherings, live band performances etc.  Brixton Way will borrow some of its design framework from the Victorian era. Think 19th century English Estates.

The primary building will consist of a 100’x40’ pavilion structure with attached walking paths that will lead to bathroom facilities, pampering rooms, and a catering prep area.  The key aesthetics of the center will be its cobblestone patio, gas light path and Victorian era inspired Grand Hall.  Some of the key amenities are the following: 

  • Cobblestone paths
  • Wooded Trails circling the property
  • Gas light pathway leading to Grand Hall Entrance
  • Water gardens
  • Stone Archways
  • Marble Fountains
  • Stone Fire Pits
  • Horse Drawn Carriage Rides
  • Reflection pond
  • Stone Patio for cocktail hour/dancing.



    The Courtyard & Grand Hall

    And now, the specifics:

    We weren't kidding when we said we have spent the last few years working on this project.  We partnered with the Small Business Administration to gather our demographic research and start formulating a design that is specifically catered to you.  With years of experience as a successful DJ company, we took notes on what people expect and what features are lacking in most event venues.

    Above all, we began to understand that our customers want options.  
    Just because my reception is indoors, why can people only dance inside?  Can we move the dancing outside?  Can we move the whole party inside if it starts to rain?  I want to enjoy the sunset!  I want to feel the cool Michigan breeze against my face as I pour another glass of wine.  

    First off if that last sentence is true, by golly you have come to the right place!
    From the moment you set foot on the Brixton property, the experience begins.  A cobblestone path warmly welcomes you on your trip towards the Grand Hall, Gas lights burning brightly to help guide the way.  The Grand Hall is large in scale, yet warmly welcomes you in to enjoy its inner beauty; as if you are walking into an old English manor.



    What about the ceremony? It is after all one of the most intimate moments a couple can share on their special day. 

    At Brixton, we have invested a large amount of time into the design of the courtyard that will accommodate this very important part of the celebration. The idea is to find a balance between beauty and space. How much is too much? How many people can we comfortably fit into this place and how do we design the space so that it is decorative and yet not obtrusive? 

    From the beginning of this endeavor, Matt and I agreed that we want this place to feel elegant but not overwhelming. The outdoor courtyard will consist of cobblestone flooring with a seating capacity of just over 200. The inner walls will be landscaped with various plants and decor to make you feel as if you are in a “secret garden" nestled deep within the walls of the manor.  Secret, yet open and inviting to a warm breeze that may just find its way to your ceremony.


    The whole idea is multi-purpose.  Let's say the weather on your wedding day is downright beautiful.  Why would you waste your evening inside?  Let's move the tables out of the courtyard, roll the bar out and tell the DJ we're dancing under a Michigan sunset!

    Looks like rain?  Well that's okay too, because the Grand hall can fit everyone comfortably and keep out the rain with retractable walls.  Our interior is just as beautiful as the exterior.  The wooden beams allow for easy placement of any decoration and will boast an overhead heating system to keep guests warm if it gets too cold out there. 

      The Impact

      Their has been a passionate fire that has been burning in the hearts and minds of Grand Rapids folk for a while now.  As a guy with a film production background, I have seen more videos go viral for GR than anything else.  Whether it's an underdog story about a micro-brewery or a simple lifestyle piece that shows off GR in all of it's cultural glory, we want to be a part of it.

      In time, this event center could be bigger than any of us had anticipated.  This could be yet another great escape that the greater Grand Rapids area has to offer..



      What We Need

      The breakdown is simple.

      • We need $400,000 to get this endeavor off the ground.
      Now we understand that a majority of this cash won't be raised on this site (though wouldn't that be something..).  We get that.  Our goal for this site is, in our opinion, quite attainable.
      In order for us to secure a small business loan, we need to put roughly 25% down towards the principal.  Simple math brings us to $100,000.  The great news is that Matt and I are already off to a great start, having pulled in a few investors who are just as passionate about this as we are.  So...what do we need from you?

                                               $40,000


      Progress to date

      So far, we have crafted and fine-tuned the business plan, polished the financial projections and purchased a nine acre parcel of land that we hope to be the future location of Brixton Way.

      We have been busy working with our planning and engineering team to create a site-plan for the nine acres. It will include every specific detail as far as building location, trail paths and how we will create and utilize a rolling landscape to accommodate the gardens. Within the next few weeks from this campaign launch, we will be submitting this plan to the planning commission  in hopes of getting the green light to start building.

      Aside from polishing the site plan; we have also started the process of taking our vision and engineering it into a blueprint for our builders. The architecturally stamped drawings will be complete near the end of September and will allow us to move forward with construction in late fall or early winter.  Just in time for the 2015 event season.


                     



      Other Ways You Can Help

      We get that contributing finances is challenging for many people.  Perhaps you aren't sold, or cash is just too darn tight right now.  Please understand, your social support and prayer support is just as important as any monetary donation.  

      Post our facebook page to friends and family!
      Read our blog on our website and stay updated with how we are doing.  

      Talk about us!

      Spread the word and you can still be a part of making this place come to life!

      Most importantly, Matt and I believe in the power of prayer.  If our God wants this to happen, it will happen.  Connect with us, share with us and pray with us. That is all we ask.

      Check out Our Facebook Page

      Or, click the website bug below to see the official Brixton Way Web Page.

      Questions?  Feel free to email us directly at: Info@brixtonway.com
story_txt:
Our Experience


For the last 20 years, my brother Matt and I have
lived in the greater Grand Rapids area, enjoying what this "best kept secret" of a city has to offer.  Now it's time to give back to the place that has for so long enriched our lives.  Here's how, with a little back story to go with it.
In
the summer of 2007, we spent a majority of our time heavily involved in the
pomp and circumstance of friends and loved ones getting married.  I can think of a whole list of adjectives to describe that promise those people make to each other before God.
How about Exciting?  Perhaps terrifying.  Uplifting, encouraging, emotional, heartfelt, wondrous!  The list goes on.  With each wedding came a recurring observation made by my brother Matt and I.  If this day is so highly valued.  If this moment is so connected with who we are and who we are to become...then this day must happen in a place worthy of its grandeur.

Time and time again we spoke with people who were frustrated by
the lack of unique venues in Grand Rapids.  People want to break free from these places that
haven't
changed their formula in a decade.  They want a place that breaks the mold.




Having been in the DJ business and wedding industry for over a decade; many clients told us they wanted more in a venue. We set out to build something that reignites the excitement and pride of a wedding day; or any event for that matter.
Something that elevates the standard of excellence.  A place with a purpose to beautify West Michigan.

story:
Imagine gold mining & finding nuggets in your pan! Well you can now even in your home, and you could find more gold then the 100% real gold containing pay dirt mined from area claims and shipped to your door! From the miner into packaging to your door! Guaranteed gold and sometimes even a profit on your purchase! A desire to be free of monthly ssdi payments and help employ a few other disabled individuals I took a hobby and turned it into a business. Starting with nothing we managed to lay down a foundation despite the odds for a start-up with no funding available.





What future are we creating?

Two different futures are being made possible here, one a way for disabled individuals whom desire to be able to return to work despite limitations but need a job with very flexile conditions and understanding employers to help cope and provide conditions that ables them to perform regardless of physical limitations. This allows a disabled and unemployed person to again provide for thenselves and others, giving back the feeling of accomplishment and function, that is often lost during lengthy unemployment, yet when that feeling is returned it creates a drive to make ways to open doors that seemed sealed shut before.

Secondly, Besides giving hope and work to disabled persons this company creates a good clean fun as well as educational activity almost anyone can enjoy!  Who wouldnt be excited to be the first person ever in the world to lay eyes on the gold they pan from the mined dirt we obtain. Its always a surprise what shape, what size, of nugget will be in there will it be a beautiful specimen. rare wire gold, it may be more in value then was paid!! Its an unknown when its taken from the earth and passed to another without being totaly searched! We dont know we test each load to insure there is good average gold so you atleast find reasonable amounts and then there are always some that crush the average and find something truly special! A mystery and excitement that once was only known to the few with access to a gold mine, now enjoyed by anyone without even leaving the house or backyard! 

Hats what its about to provide at the highest level of care and quality possible to know someone smiled today someone enjoyed themselves or time with others thru the experience many could never have had easily before, and on top the lives changed by being able to return to the workforce thru new found abilities, regaining alot from feeling productive and able to provide once again!

How We Are Creating It

I started a small business out of my home in which I was able to work very flexible hours, work in any kind of position sitting standing at times whatever when the injuries or body needed to, no heavy lifting was required and many other benefits for an injured and disabled person.  I soon needed help and decided this was something I needed to share with as many like myself that needed an opportunity like I had created.


Our Story & Why You Should Support U

Hi!! My name is Robert Schaefer thats me above, I had been unemployed for a long time, owing to physical disabilities; yet had a resolution to be independent and free of periodical Social Security payment, so I decided to maximize my potential and passion.  As a result, I first started as an eBay seller, offering exclusive pay-dirt concentrates (you know the dirt they shovel into machinery on shows like Gold Rush or Bearing Sea gold, the dirt with gold nuggets hidded within!!) as well as special deals of gold matrix specimens, loose nuggets, and equipment like sluice boxes and pans. These could be used in home by anyone wishing to try thier hand at panning for gold and not having access to gold bearing areas, or for the miner wanting to practice setting up thier machines to insure less gold loss in the field. I had started gold mining as a hobby and now am turnining it into a business wherein I began to feel a sense of personal fulfillment by being productive agian and wanted to share with other disabled individuals

  With business growing, I employed another disabled person to work with me wanting to share the newfound flexible emoploymet with someone else in need.  Business was already doing well considering it was started with no financial backing besides the couple hundred dollars on hand at the time.

We quickly grew much bigger than imagined and found ourselves now in a place where we need funding to be able to purchase wholesale lots of the equipment we sell to miners and hobbyists, obtain enough stock of the mined dirt we offer and had so many very pleased with. We dont have the means to purchase the wholesale bulk orders at lower cost which would allow us to grow further, hire more help, provide our customers with an even better price then we can now, all while not worrying day to day if we are going to be able to fill demand before we can order more inventory. .  We need proper stock on hand in order to run profitently, be able to order more before we are running out of product, purchasing product at the lower rate as well as giving us more room to put some funds away incase the need arrises to handle unexpected costs. T be able to use saved funds to hire additional help with the networking side.  We already cut most of our advertising because we just couldnt afford to purchase enough sellable items at a time to handle the load and are just doing enough to keep the business alive, it needs support so it can reach full potential.

We have seen and we know what amazing oppertunity is in front of us.  The only thing hampering us from reaching further is lack of funding.  With this help we can again advertise while keeping enough items in stock to fill orders in time, soon after hire a few others in much need of a flexible work opportunity and make this into the thriving venture it has shown it can be while giving those in need an income to provide for themselves and family, bring a positive outlook into those lives again, and give our customers a special product they are sure to enjoy that normaly would not be as easy to experience for most!

We can create alot of good in numerous ways here. I've tried to obtain funding thru banks and other lenders, they wont approve anything after being unemployed so long and the business being so new. This is our last chance to obtain the funding needed to create the path that will see this venture off to doing good in many ways for many people thru existece

What we are asking:

In short we have no financial power to pour into inventory to fulfill demand that we experience, pay off a few debts from past years while unemployed that are currently affecting the ability to obtain credit for the business which would allow us further growth in the future, into other areas we are thinking of such as making gold nugget jewelry and other items that have been being perfected on the side. We can begin to advertise the new site and let it be known we are in business ready to meet demands and I would like to hire a few other people who are unemployed and could benefit from what we can provide in terms of flexible and understanding work conditions. This is why we are here.

All efforts to obtain credit facilities from financial institutions proved abortive. I have tried bank loans and some other credit facilities, but my applications were not granted. Nonetheless, I'm not giving up at all after what good was stemming from the work.

I ask please if anyone can contribute to our cause please do! We wont stop and are sure to see this thru and make as many changes for the better in our and others lives as possible!  This is an amazing opportunity and any bit large or small is a big thing towards seeing this thru!!

I am truly grateful for any help granted towards our venture. If you can share the campaign page on your social accounts just to get the word out there, or contribute funding towards the needs listed above, I cant begin to express my gratitude to you. So far we also gained the support of NIADW.org which is great, especially them allowing us to share the campaign thru their webspace. 

I will be creating a supporters page on the website goldbearingpaydirt.com at the end of the campaign listing all those who contributed to the survival and rebuilding of this business.


Gold paydirt review from goldbearingpaydirt.com

"Had a lot of fun panning this paydirt. Tons of black sand so take your time and do a spoonful at a time. I found .7 grams of really nice pickers and nuggets ..."

a 35-40$ order a customer had reviewed. be sure to play it thru as he starts it with only a tiny bit of what he found in the pan to show the fine gold and then the nuggets...

I have just 2 very rare gold in quartz matrix museum grade display pieces, these are the most beautiful gold formations you can find (if your very lucky) these are something to display very proudly you will never find another like each one. Pieces of the sorts are worth many times thier weight in gold sometimes upwards of 6times guarenteed to please!!!

story:
FEATURED IN

BrightSwitch Features

  • Installs in minutes
  • Uses Existing Light Switch
  • Same Appearance and Function as Before
  • Independent Operation - Install and Forget
  • No Hub - No programming - No Apps
  • 1000 watt load rating
  • Microprocessor Technology - Memorizes room lighting pattern and adjusts Internal Timer to optimize Typical "On-Time" of room
  • Pre-warning before lights turn off
  • Lighting applications: LED, Fluorescent, Halogen, incandescent
  • Other applications: Ceiling fans, Bathroom Ventilation fans
  • Also works with 3-way switches



Clean, low profile design

All of the electronics of the BrightSwitch are enclosed inside the cover plate, and with the familiar look and feel of a standard light switch, technology controlled lighting becomes child friendly and provides many years of efficient, carefree, reliable service.



Easy to install

  • Simply remove the existing light switch cover.
  • Attach the two wires from the BrightSwitch to the existing light switch. 
  • Mount the BrightSwitch in place of the old cover.

Current market solutions

Multiple variations of the standard spring wound and programmable light timers are on the market today, however, they are very limited in practicality and daily use in the average home applications. 


The simplicity and carefree function of the BrightSwitch provides a robust alternative and a REAL solution.


Our Mission

Energy experts agree...One of the most effective ways we can impact energy waste is simply turning off lights when we leave a room. 

With a BrightSwitch installed  to your existing light switches, you can reduce your power bill and make a significant contribution to global energy conservation.

  • It's good for the wallet
  • It's good for the planet

My Story

I am a retired engineer with a long  career working for defense contractor companies, designing and manufacture products related to cutting edge technology. Over the years of being a homeowner and raising a family, I became keenly aware of lights burning needlessly for hours and even days. Not being able to find any realistic and practical solution, other than constantly yelling at the kids to turn off the lights, my frustration grew. 

I recently remembered participating in a project several years ago with Bell Telephone Company. They were experiencing serious issues with lights being left on for days and weeks in remote relay substations. Their solution was the inspiration for BrightSwitch!


Our Goal

To provide BrightSwitch technology in residential homes, business offices, hotels, motels, or any other place where energy is wasted from unattended burning lights.

Colors Available

We are currently making the BrightSwitch in three colors:

  • White
  • Light almond
  • Ivory

Switch cover configurations available


Risks and challenges

A great amount of effort and resources have been spent in designing and testing a product that meets the highest standards of craftsmanship, performance and durability. We have had some significant challenges on our journey which we have overcome and we are now in a very good position, but surprises can happen. We will be transparent and inform our backers of potential hurdles that might come up.

FULFILLMENT

We have built in extra time for any problems that might come up during the new design upgrades, added safety testing and manufacturing process, and we are confident we will ship by the projected dates however, we will always keep you notified if things take longer than we expect.

PRODUCT

We have taken the following steps to make sure that we deliver the highest quality product: 

-  Produced and thoroughly tested an initial product run of 100 BrightSwitches to insure quality. In order to enhance the product experience, we will continue to improve the product based on your feedback. 

-  Extensively tested prototypes for performance, convenience and durability.

MANUFACTURING

 We have established relationships with experienced manufacturers to mitigate the risk of delays by material suppliers and to ensure quality control is implemented to the highest level. In addition, we have produced an initial run with our manufacturers and set up all the necessary facilities and tooling.

Again, things are looking great! But if any unforeseen problems do come up, we will make sure to let our backers know as soon as possible.
