story:
LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM

 

THIS INNOVATION

SAVES LIVES!

 

PLEASE VIEW OUR 3 MINUTE VIDEO ABOVE FOR A BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF WHAT THIS EXCITING CONCEPT IS ABOUT

    

LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM

      

  Some are calling this their #1 most wanted invention in upcoming car safety features! 

 

                                         Make Your Vehicle Intelligent!
                                       Pay It Forward! Help Save Lives!


I'm creating a vehicle safety feature that saves lives!  You can help me get the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM out to the world!

Imagine what the world would be like if your loved one, friend or family member had lived or  avoided injury instead of suffering from a tragic vehicle accident! 

Death rates according to research statistics as documented by Alik Lounsary Phd., Advanced Photon Sources, Argonne National Library are as follows: On average 40,000 people die each year throughout North America in automobile crashes! 

Also, North American airplane crashes account for 200 deaths per year.  And, train, ship, cruise ship, recreational boat etc. accidents each year add to these staggering numbers!  The total number of deaths each year due to every type of vehicle accident is enormous!  In addition to vehicle caused deaths there are thousands upon thousands of injuries due to all types of vehicle accidents, each and every year!

Envision a new world - A world of greater safety!  Imagine fewer car and truck crashes!  Imagine fewer ship accidents in lakes and oceans …  and fewer airplane fatalities!!! 

Imagine what the world would be like if your loved one, friend or family member had lived or avoided injury!  It would be a new world!  And, it can be a new world with the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM! 

You can help us get the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM out to the world!  With your Contribution together we  can help SAVE LIVES!!! With your Contribution we can take our next important steps in developing our Innovation.  Imagine what the world would be like with the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM!  It would be a better and safer world where you can relax and enjoy a safer travel experience.

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is my Patent Pending innovation, which is in the 'Development of Concept' phase and I will soon be ready to build the Prototype!

What is the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM? 

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is one step ahead in leading edge, vehicle safety feature innovations! This device monitors Brain Waves, and alerts the vehicle operator immediately, as soon as drowsiness begins.

 

LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM - HEADBAND COMPONENT - Monitors Brainwaves

                                                                                           

 You have never seen anything like this before! This device will save tens of thousands of lives each year.  While operating a vehicle drowsiness and falling asleep is a huge problem!  The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM will solve this problem!

If drowsy the vehicle operator will receive an alert consisting of both audio and visual signals/information.  The vehicle operator receives an alert as soon as drowsiness begins.  And, driving should not resume until the driver is alert.  This device will help prevent falling asleep while driving, and therefore will help vehicle operators avoid accidents on the road. Travel will become much safer.

Future enhancements for this system especially designed for transport trucks are already in the planning phase and include alerting the vehicle operator of changing road conditions 100 meters to the front,  as well as monitoring the vehicle operator's temperature and pulse.

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM consists of a light-weight Headband enhanced with new technology and designed for your comfort while you operate a vehicle, even if worn all day.

 

LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM - HEADBAND COMPONENT

                                                                                                              

This innovative Headband is adapted with leading edge, new technology  designed to record and monitor the vehicle operator’s brain waves.  By monitoring brain waves, drowsiness is detected immediately at the source.

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is unique since it is designed to provide an immediate alert  as soon as the vehicle operator's brainwaves change and if drowsiness begins for any reason.  The device monitors the vehicle operator’s brain waves for alertness/drowsiness to determine if one is awake or beginning to fall asleep.

If the vehicle operator becomes drowsy or begins to fall asleep, or is on any type of medication affecting the vehicle operator's alertness, alarm signals will begin immediately. The alarm signals will alert the vehicle operator immediately as soon as drowsiness begins.  Because this device monitors brainwaves, it is highly fine tuned and can sense drowsiness immediately. 

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is the only alertness device that provides accurate alarms in enough time to help avoid a vehicle accident. 

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM  also consists of an enhanced Processor installed into the vehicle. This is technology central for the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM and can be further enhanced with many additional features such as the ability to provide information about temperature and pulse, along with accurately monitoring brain waves. 

In addition to monitoring brain waves to notify the driver when drowsiness occurs there are future enhancements in the works.  Future enhancements of the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM  for transport trucks will include the ability to record traffic conditions up to 100 meters distance in front of the vehicle.  Also, a potential future optional feature (presently in development phase) is additional monitoring of information/communication between the vehicle operator and an emergency response center.

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM  integrates a professional, commercial quality Headband, blue tooth technology, and micro-computer chip, together with an enhanced Processor, along with the newest in computer/electronic technology. Alerts are both audio and video, and recorded for future recovery.

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is the one and only vehicle monitor awareness system capable of detecting drowsiness as soon as it begins, fine tuned to immediately detect the slightest change in the vehicle operator's brain waves.  This brain wave feature is of utmost importance since it is the only way to  provide an immediate, accurate drowsiness alert.  A drowsiness alert delay of minutes or seconds would be the difference between life and death when operating a vehicle! By remaining alert and awake when operating a vehicle you will enjoy  less injuries and deaths due to tragic vehicle accidents, and safer travels!

Insurance companies are sure to offer significant discounts to individuals and corporations who purchase a LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM for their vehicle operator. 

The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM will help you relax, and enjoy your travel experience.

        

             KEN HENSHAW - INNOVATOR -  Fallfest, Hamilton, ON.
              - Enjoyed a full day of Meet & Greet the Public -

                                                                              

                                                       SELF & BACKGROUND

I have over 25 years of successful experience as a Computer Engineer Support Technician, specializing in Computer Room Support and Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS).

Also, I am the successful Innovator/Inventor of:

1) High Technology Golf Club Cleaner; cleans golf clubs by means of Sound Wave Technology. 

2) Custom Design Power Source for Computerized Power Distribution.
 

                                                 Ken Henshaw, Innovator,

                                                 hrds1933@gmail.com


 

                                What We Need & What You Get

                                                      Most of the Contributions will provide funding to build

                                                       the Prototype for the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM. 

                                                      With your Contribution together we can help Save Lives!

 

                                                 FUNDING DETAILS – GOAL $7,800

WHAT WE NEED! - GOAL $7,800

Prototype                             $3,860
Beta Unit
- components

Grant Application                 $700

Business Incorporation      $600

% indiegogo facilitators      $780

Video Filming/Editing         $ 300 

 Marketing &                          $1,560
Campaign Management    _______

TOTAL                                    $7,800   

 

 

 PERKS – WHAT YOU GET!

Most importantly you get personal satisfaction in knowing you have played an important part in helping to save lives!

You also get -

$10 - Special, Personal Thank You

$25 - LIFESAVER Certificate, plus above

$50 - LIFESAVER Pen, plus above

$200 - LIFESAVER Tee Shirt, plus above

$500 - LIFESAVER Cap, plus above

$1,000 - LIFESAVER Compu-Briefcase Bag, plus above

 

                                   Ken Henshaw - Innnovator - LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM

                                             Photo - Gord Bowes, Hamilton Mountain News


     

                                             The Impact

                             Your Contribution will help to 

                                          SAVE LIVES!

    If the operator of a vehicle on the road, on the water, or in the sky begins to fall asleep, or is intoxicated, or alertness level is affected by medications, or for any reason awareness level is decreased then brainwave frequencies change.  When a driver is no longer alert because brainwaves are detected to be at a drowsy frequency the operator will be alerted via vibration device installed in the Headband (along with audio/visual alarms).  Lives will be saved!

    Also, an optional feature for the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is the ability to connect the vehicle operator with an Emergency Call Center, monitored 365 days a year, 24 hours a day, by medical professionals.

    Future additional features for the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM designed for transport trucks are enhancements to monitor safety conditions on the road ie. alert if the road ahead is blocked up to 100 meters due to accident, fallen tree, or in poor vision quality (fog, snow) and alerts if there is an obstacle.

    The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM gives the operator information about how to make safe, informed decisions. 

    This device will save over 10,000 lives per year, just in North America alone.  The vision is to expand World-Wide and make the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM available internationally.

     

                                                          RISKS AND CHALLENGES

    Overall there are almost no risks and challenges in developing and promoting the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM.  The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is an enhanced, leading edge headband device that will save tens of thousands of lives per year.

    The only small risk or obstacle may be in the time it takes to be accepted by the Gov’t, Department of Transport, and the Police Department to have this new device, the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM mandated for all vehicles.

     

                                               HOW TO OVERCOME RISKS AND CHALLENGES

    The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM will save hundreds and thousands of lives each year throughout North America. 

    The minor challenge of being quickly integrated and promoted by the Gov’t, Department of Transport, and the Police Department will be overcome with the strong plan that I have set in place to lobby these agencies directly.  Once they are completely informed with the facts and figures they will quickly be on board.

    My vision is to soon have the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM mandated by law. 

    Once 100,000 units of the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM system is in use by the public then approximately 1,000 lives per year will be saved from vehicle accidents in North America. The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM once developed to its full potential will go international.

    I have incorporated strong Research & Development which will be ongoing.  Research & Development is key to highly profitable progress with the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM in order to keep updated and one step ahead.


                                                          Ken Henshaw, Innovator
                                                   hrds1933@gmail.com

                                       

                                    More Ways You Can Help

    Please know that all contributions large or small are very much appreciated and helpful!  It's easy to support our campaign - you can Contribute on-line by clicking on the Heart (top right of home page) or clicking on one of the Perks.  All Contributions through Indiegogo are safe & secure by means of Credit Card or Paypal.

    Some people are unable to contribute at this time, but there are still important ways that you can help!
     

                                                              WAYS YOU CAN HELP

      You can help us take our concept for developing my new innovation the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM from the drawing board to reality with your investment contribution. 

      You can also help us to develop this new, High Technology innovation the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM by getting the word out there to your family, friends, colleagues, and through your social media such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn etc. Please encourage everyone to check out our campaign!

      Also, please use the indiegogo "Share Tools" to get the word out there.  Make a noise!  Let everyone know about our exciting, new innovation the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM.  We have the technology – together we can make it happen!

      Envision a new world!  A world of safety!  It’s a new world with the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM and with your investment contribution in support of our campaign, together we can SAVE LIVES!
       

                 THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING THE LIFESAVER CAMPAIGN!

      LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM
       Ken Henshaw
      hrds1933@gmail.com
       

      And that's all there is to it!

      Copyright Ken Henshaw 2016

LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM
 THIS INNOVATION SAVES LIVES!  PLEASE VIEW OUR 3 MINUTE VIDEO ABOVE FOR A BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF WHAT THIS EXCITING CONCEPT IS ABOUT     LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM        Some are calling this their #1 most wanted invention in upcoming car safety features!                                           Make Your Vehicle Intelligent!                                       Pay It Forward! Help Save Lives!I'm creating a vehicle safety feature that saves lives!  You can help me get the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM out to the world!Imagine what the world would be like if your loved one, friend or family member had lived or  avoided injury instead of suffering from a tragic vehicle accident!  Death rates according to research statistics as documented by Alik Lounsary Phd., Advanced Photon Sources, Argonne National Library are as follows: On average 40,000 people die each year throughout North America in automobile crashes!  Also, North American airplane crashes account for 200 deaths per year.  And, train, ship, cruise ship, recreational boat etc. accidents each year add to these staggering numbers!  The total number of deaths each year due to every type of vehicle accident is enormous!  In addition to vehicle caused deaths there are thousands upon thousands of injuries due to all types of vehicle accidents, each and every year!Envision a new world - A world of greater safety!  Imagine fewer car and truck crashes!  Imagine fewer ship accidents in lakes and oceans …  and fewer airplane fatalities!!! Imagine what the world would be like if your loved one, friend or family member had lived or avoided injury!  It would be a new world!  And, it can be a new world with the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM!  You can help us get the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM out to the world!  With your Contribution together we  can help SAVE LIVES!!! With your Contribution we can take our next important steps in developing our Innovation.  Imagine what the world would be like with the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM!  It would be a better and safer world where you can relax and enjoy a safer travel experience.The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is my Patent Pending innovation, which is in the 'Development of Concept' phase and I will soon be ready to build the Prototype!What is the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM? The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is one step ahead in leading edge, vehicle safety feature innovations! This device monitors Brain Waves, and alerts the vehicle operator immediately, as soon as drowsiness begins. LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM - HEADBAND COMPONENT - Monitors Brainwaves                                                                                            You have never seen anything like this before! This device will save tens of thousands of lives each year.  While operating a vehicle drowsiness and falling asleep is a huge problem!  The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM will solve this problem! If drowsy the vehicle operator will receive an alert consisting of both audio and visual signals/information.  The vehicle operator receives an alert as soon as drowsiness begins.  And, driving should not resume until the driver is alert.  This device will help prevent falling asleep while driving, and therefore will help vehicle operators avoid accidents on the road. Travel will become much safer.Future enhancements for this system especially designed for transport trucks are already in the planning phase and include alerting the vehicle operator of changing road conditions 100 meters to the front,  as well as monitoring the vehicle operator's temperature and pulse.The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM consists of a light-weight Headband enhanced with new technology and designed for your comfort while you operate a vehicle, even if worn all day. LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM - HEADBAND COMPONENT                                                                                                              This innovative Headband is adapted with leading edge, new technology  designed to record and monitor the vehicle operator’s brain waves.  By monitoring brain waves, drowsiness is detected immediately at the source. The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is unique since it is designed to provide an immediate alert  as soon as the vehicle operator's brainwaves change and if drowsiness begins for any reason.  The device monitors the vehicle operator’s brain waves for alertness/drowsiness to determine if one is awake or beginning to fall asleep.If the vehicle operator becomes drowsy or begins to fall asleep, or is on any type of medication affecting the vehicle operator's alertness, alarm signals will begin immediately. The alarm signals will alert the vehicle operator immediately as soon as drowsiness begins.  Because this device monitors brainwaves, it is highly fine tuned and can sense drowsiness immediately.  The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is the only alertness device that provides accurate alarms in enough time to help avoid a vehicle accident.  The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM  also consists of an enhanced Processor installed into the vehicle. This is technology central for the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM and can be further enhanced with many additional features such as the ability to provide information about temperature and pulse, along with accurately monitoring brain waves. In addition to monitoring brain waves to notify the driver when drowsiness occurs there are future enhancements in the works.  Future enhancements of the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM  for transport trucks will include the ability to record traffic conditions up to 100 meters distance in front of the vehicle.  Also, a potential future optional feature (presently in development phase) is additional monitoring of information/communication between the vehicle operator and an emergency response center.The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM  integrates a professional, commercial quality Headband, blue tooth technology, and micro-computer chip, together with an enhanced Processor, along with the newest in computer/electronic technology. Alerts are both audio and video, and recorded for future recovery.The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM is the one and only vehicle monitor awareness system capable of detecting drowsiness as soon as it begins, fine tuned to immediately detect the slightest change in the vehicle operator's brain waves.  This brain wave feature is of utmost importance since it is the only way to  provide an immediate, accurate drowsiness alert.  A drowsiness alert delay of minutes or seconds would be the difference between life and death when operating a vehicle! By remaining alert and awake when operating a vehicle you will enjoy  less injuries and deaths due to tragic vehicle accidents, and safer travels!Insurance companies are sure to offer significant discounts to individuals and corporations who purchase a LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM for their vehicle operator. The LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM will help you relax, and enjoy your travel experience.                     KEN HENSHAW - INNOVATOR -  Fallfest, Hamilton, ON.              - Enjoyed a full day of Meet & Greet the Public -                                                                                                                                     SELF & BACKGROUNDI have over 25 years of successful experience as a Computer Engineer Support Technician, specializing in Computer Room Support and Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS).Also, I am the successful Innovator/Inventor of:1) High Technology Golf Club Cleaner; cleans golf clubs by means of Sound Wave Technology.  2) Custom Design Power Source for Computerized Power Distribution.                                                  Ken Henshaw, Innovator,                                                 hrds1933@gmail.com                                 What We Need & What You Get                                                      Most of the Contributions will provide funding to build                                                       the Prototype for the LIFESAVER MONITOR SYSTEM.                                                       With your Contribution together we can help Save Lives!                                                  FUNDING DETAILS – GOAL $7,800WHAT WE NEED! - GOAL $7,800Prototype                             $3,860Beta Unit- componentsGrant Application                 $700Business Incorporation      $600 % indiegogo facilitators      $780Video Filming/Editing         $ 300   Marketing &                          $1,560Campaign Management    _______TOTAL                                    $7,800       PERKS – WHAT YOU GET! story:
We are a creative content agency that values simplifying the  process and building engaging  that will enhance your digital footprint, one step at a time. 

Smart City Media emerged from an underground collective of interactive designers, gearing up to bring a new wave of creativity to the vibrant and rapidly growing business and tech scene in Vancouver.


A BBA in marketing, with a focus on entrepreneurship and digital media, Myles provides the strategy and marketing angle on how to most effectively identify opportunities and how to leverage the web to get there. Kind of like Spiderman ('web', get it?).  Being apart of producing a YouTube channel that today has over 3.4 million views, video was his spark for a content creation passion. Myles' goal is to maximize the potential of clients digital and content strategy through integrating design, development and business, as well as bridge the communication gap between those departments.

With years of self driven passion, Connor has taught himself everything that makes him the Batman of content creation. A perfectionist, who knows how to build almost anything and everything creative. Having worked on productions for National Geographic and History Channel, Connor holds himself to high standards. His pen tool does not rest until everything is perfect. With a comprehensive understanding and appreciation of business goals, Connor integrates purpose and design flawlessly.

Myles Galvin and Connor McGuire are the Co-Founders, hereinafter referred to as "we".

We bring an array of skills to the table and together, we complement one another like Batman and Spiderman. They compliment one another in a cool, awesome kind of way, right? I mean, if they lived in the same comic book universe kind of thing...




          

Artfully crafted animations that portray your brand in ways traditional video can't. Like the video above.



With the combination of digital strategy, interactive design and creative thinking, our innovative approach focuses on integrating functionality and style into your website. 


           

Viral doesn’t just happen, it is consistent multi-channel engagement and real time communication. At the heart of every digital campaign is stunning, meaningful and valuable content, designed to connect with communities through specific channels. 




Creating videos accumulating over 3 million views to high quality travel videos and commercials to working on shows produced for National Geographic and History Channel, our experiences are rich. We've got you covered from concept to delivery and beyond

We have decided to launch a micro-campaign to cover some upfront startup costs, which are primarily legal (incorporation) fees. 

There are a very limited amount of perks available as the services are being heavily discounted, hence "micro-campaign".

The perks we are offering are coupons to our services. Please do not hesitate to contact us before purchasing a perk.

info@smartcitymedia.co


             

For a few months we had been discussing the idea of launching our own business revolving around 'video stuff'. We have both been doing freelance videography for years and realized that we are both capable of producing some pretty cool content.

Once the word leaked around the office that we were launching Smart City Media, we received a lot of interest in our services, which gave us confidence that we were filling a market need.

After a two month trial run with a couple of select clients, we are excited to go forward with incorporating Smart City Media. This will ensure that both us and our clients will be working within a proper business structure.

Being on the same page and all, neither of us wanted to go through the tangled experience of mixing business and personal expenses within a personal bank account ever again. For those of us who have experienced that, we know how jumbled that can get.

The main purpose for this Indiegogo campaign is to raise enough money so that we can cover those upfront legal costs to set the business structure in place.  The remainder of the budget will go towards office equipment, labour and other operational overhead.

If we surpass our goal, we will invest in equipment that will up our production value big time and expand our service offerings. 

A couple things we don't shut up about: 

DJI Phantom Quadrocopter 
Go Pro Hero

             We want to be able to film from the sky. Imagine the possibilities.


Whether or not you make a financial contribution, just by taking the time to read this, watch our video, check out our website or share us with your friends, you've made a giant contribution.

   So please, if you have friends and family who you think may benefit from the             types of services we offer, we would love to connect and learn more.

Feel free to share our campaign via Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc! 
Indiegogo has some great sharing tools.


info@smartcitymedia.co

 www.smartcitymedia.co

story:
Our Story


Aloha,

We are two sweetie pies that are here to bring abundance of happiness and health to your sweet tooth.  Our  names are Ahna Austin and Adriana Zollo and here is our story. We have known each other since we were little children and grew up through some interesting times. When college happened we parted ways and reunited after six years in our home town Port Jefferson, New York. After telling her my story and how I ended up in Hawaii she was convinced that this was her path to a health concise lifestyle. 
With my knowledge of raw and healthy foods and Adriana's creative mind, we brought to life The Rawdue Pies. They are not only pies, they are a way to bring family and friends together. Food is a bonding experience for most people and cultures, and we want you to have the full experience! 
The Rawdue Pies are a play off of Fondue, hence the name Rawdue. You may choose from a couple options of crusts! Once you choose the crust you decide on a few options from nuts, coconut, fresh fruit, dried fruit, cacao and much more! They will be presented in the center of the table with your crust...and then the fun begins!
We want to bring more life to the city of Paia and for there to be a place to go to at night where young people can socialize in a healthy environment. Currently the options are very limited and we are just envisioning a place where local artists could show their work, network, and enjoy great food! We want this to be up and running within the end of this year! Our goal is high but our intention is to bring on something exciting for a town that has become overrun by tourists and there is a need for a nightly scene with a creative twist! We hope that you are just as excited as us! 
Also, 20% of the money we make will go towards the city of Paia to try and create a "green" common space. Currently we are trying to find out from the town hall where this could be possible. However, we want to expand our ideas throughout the community and make sure that we give back as well! Paia, Hawaii is a place that is loaded with many people coming in and out of it everyday, but there is no public area that can be enjoyed for just sitting, eating, or socializing. We want this to happen!! This town needs more unity and more positivity! 

Ahna and I are currently working at Farmer's Markets to sell our Raw desserts to spread the buzz and once we raise the funds from indiegogo and all the wonderful sponsors we will be ready to move forward with the entire plan! 


The Impact

This new craze is here for you. All you health concise, guilty pleasure, sweet tooth, social bugs...well you have found the right spot. The reason for these delectable treats is to bring friends and family together for a sweet treat while good for you mind body and soul. The main ingredients in the crust of the pies are nuts, dates, and coconut.

The city we live in Paia, Hawaii is a very happening town. There a lot of cute stores and some sweet restaurants. When it comes to the night scene there doesn't seem to be a lot of activities. The main thing to do is go to the bars, but what about the health concise crowd? Well our idea is to have a shop that allows people to come together and what better way then with something sweet? The concept of the pies is there will be a crust and the base of the pie. Chocolate turtle pie, raw cheese cake pie, or..........Then there would be the options of many different toppings such as fruits that are in season, toasted coconut, goji berries, and cacao nibs. There will be also options of some raw sauces to add the to the pallet of your creation. Its the RAWDUE! A new way to bring people together. 

This campaign is very important! We are trying to expand people's knowledge of their health through food and make a place where more social interaction can take place during the evenings! Also, just envision a cute small touristy town that is about a block long and full of people without a public green space! We want to use some of our funds to make this happen! The city will benefit in the long run and it will breath new life into the community and inspire others to make a change as well.

What We Need & What You Get


We are shooting for the stars! We are looking to raise about 15,000 and 20% of this will be going towards making a campaign for a green space in the city of Paia, and the rest will go towards our 'Rawdue" lounge. We are looking for support, and thats all we can ask for. Well if you are going to aim high might as well shoot for the stars right? We would love to manifest 15,000 to support us in creating our dream come true. We have no other funding sources and just heard about this website.

We believe in our goal and want you to as well! Also, some of the proceeds will go towards  our ingredients in bringing these pies to restaurants in the Paia area. We want to spread the mana so our goal is to get these pies out there and hopefully it shall spread and people will eat amazing treats guilt free! :) All in all the proceeds are going towards ingredients, investing in a space, and then donating some to the city. Therefore our goal is high!




Other Ways You Can Help


The way to help is spread the word! Word of mouth is the best way to get anything out there....A.K.A the coconut wireless :) Tell your family, friends, anyone who is interested in helping two entrepreneurs live their dream and spread positivity to the community! Send a link through facebook or twitter. Email us as well with any ideas that may help. Knowledge is power and of course it is great to share it :)
story_txt:
Our Story

Aloha,

We are two sweetie pies that are here to bring abundance of happiness and health to your sweet tooth.  Our  names are Ahna Austin and Adriana Zollo and here is our story. We have known each other since we were little children and grew up through some interesting times. When college happened we parted ways and reunited after six years in our home town Port Jefferson, New York. After telling her my story and how I ended up in Hawaii she was convinced that this was her path to a health concise lifestyle. 
With my knowledge of raw and healthy foods and Adriana's creative mind, we brought to life The Rawdue Pies. They are not only pies, they are a way to bring family and friends together. Food is a bonding experience for most people and cultures, and we want you to have the full experience! 
The Rawdue Pies are a play off of Fondue, hence the name Rawdue. You may choose from a couple options of crusts! Once you choose the crust you decide on a few options from nuts, coconut, fresh fruit, dried fruit, cacao and much more! They will be presented in the center of the table with your crust...and then the fun begins!
We want to bring more life to the city of Paia and for there to be a place to go to at night where young people can socialize in a healthy environment. Currently the options are very limited and we are just envisioning a place where local artists could show their work, network, and enjoy great food! We want this to be up and running within the end of this year! Our goal is high but our intention is to bring on something exciting for a town that has become overrun by tourists and there is a need for a nightly scene with a creative twist! We hope that you are just as excited as us! 
Also, 20% of the money we make will go towards the city of Paia to try and create a "green" common space. Currently we are trying to find out from the town hall where this could be possible. However, we want to expand our ideas throughout the community and make sure that we give back as well! Paia, Hawaii is a place that is loaded with many people coming in and out of it everyday, but there is no public area that can be enjoyed for just sitting, eating, or socializing. We want this to happen!! This town needs more unity and more positivity! 
Ahna and I are currently working at Farmer's Markets to sell our Raw desserts to spread the buzz and once we raise the funds from indiegogo and all the wonderful sponsors we will be ready to move forward with the entire plan! 


The Impact
This new craze is here for you. All you health concise, guilty pleasure, sweet tooth, social bugs...well you have found the right spot. The reason for these delectable treats is to bring friends and family together for a sweet treat while good for you mind body and soul. The main ingredients in the crust of the pies are nuts, dates, and coconut.

Chocolate turtle pie, raw cheese cake pie, or..........Then there would be the options of many different toppings such as fruits that are in season, toasted coconut, goji berries, and cacao nibs. There will be also options of some raw sauces to add the to the pallet of your creation. Its the RAWDUE! A new way to bring people together. 

This campaign is very important! We are trying to expand people's knowledge of their health through food and make a place where more social interaction can take place during the evenings! Also, just envision a cute small touristy town that is about a block long and full of people without a public green space! We want to use some of our funds to make this happen! The city will benefit in the long run and it will breath new life into the community and inspire others to make a change as well.


What We Need & What You Get

We are shooting for the stars! We are looking to raise about 15,000 and 20% of this will be going towards making a campaign for a green space in the city of Paia, and the rest will go towards our 'Rawdue" lounge. We are looking for support, and thats all we can ask for. Well if you are going to aim high might as well shoot for the stars right? We would love to manifest 15,000 to support us in creating our dream come true. We have no other funding sources and just heard about this website.
We believe in our goal and want you to as well! Also, some of the proceeds will go towards  our ingredients in bringing these pies to restaurants in the Paia area. We want to spread the mana so our goal is to get these pies out there and hopefully it shall spread and people will eat amazing treats guilt free! :) All in all the proceeds are going towards ingredients, investing in a space, and then donating some to the city. story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Sonya Elmore, the owner of La Luna Dance Studio in Bensalem, PA and I am asking for your help.

Mid-November 2012, two of the local Philadelphia Photographers/Salsa dancers were attending a Salsa event taking pictures/videos, something they love to do and do hours on end with no charge at numerous Salsa events throughout  our city. 

Their names are Brandon Scrubs and Stephanie Ramones.  They just started their brand new photography business, named Contigo Photography.  They were excited about finding their calling and all the upcoming projects. 

Unfortunately, someone decided to take 3 of their very valuable lenses during the Salsa event and the lenses have not been returned.  Brandon and Stephanie simply cannot deliver the quality work that we are used to without this equipment.  More importantly, they cannot deliver the high quality work to their paying clients, who the need the most to make a living!

So, with the suggestion of a few local Salsa dancers, I HAVE TAKEN IT UPON MYSELF, to create this fundraising campaign to raise $850 to cover the cost of the missing lenses and the fees associated with running this fundraiser.  Brandon and Stephanie HAVE NO IDEA that we are doing this.  They are also going to refuse the money we raise but I know we will talk them into taking it.  We want to continue to see those fabulous pictures of our Salsa events AND we want them to continue making a living doing what they love to do!!

What We Need & What You Get

Here is what we need:
  • $700 to cover the cost of the missing lenses (goes directly to Brandon & Stephanie)
  • $150 to cover the administrative fees (goes directly to Indiegogo and Paypal)
We unite as a Salsa family once again and come together to help one of our own who is in trouble.  So you will get that feel-good-feeling that YOU made a difference in someone's life.

The Impact

In the spirit of Thanksgiving, I am so thankful for Salsa dancing and all the people that it has brought to my life.  Stephanie and Brandon are two of those people, they are just good people that you hate to see bad stuff happen to.  Let's show them our love and support and how grateful we are for all those amazing moments they capture.  All we need is $850. Even if each person donated only $10, we only need 85 people!  And we definitely have a lot more in our Salsa community.  The impact of this fundraiser will be incredible on so many levels.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, please spread the word and share this fundraiser.  Thank you so much!!!

story:
Short Summary

The San Jose State University Ice Hockey team has qualified for the National Championship in Boston, MA., and we need your help!

San Jose State Ice Hockey Club is a 22 year member of the American Collegiate Hockey Association (ACHA Div 2).  The ACHA is the largest Collegiate Hockey League in the U.S. boasting 450 teams in total with more than 200 of these teams participating in Men's Division 2.   The ACHA Div 2 National Tournament features the best  teams from the Northeast, Central, Southeast and Western divisions with teams winning their Regional Playoffs tournaments to qualify.  The Spartans have made it to the ACHA National Tournament TEN times in its 23 year history, this year being the third time in the past 5 years!   Although the Spartans have not come home with the National Title in its previous campaigns, we believe that with our mix of talent, skill, coaching and heart on this years team that this is our time, and we will accept nothing less than a championship for SJSU! 

As a club sport, we do not get the necessary funding from our University to cover the expenses for our season which has a budget of $150,000+not including post season play.  This budget is funded by player dues (over $4000 per player), merchandise and ticket sales, sponsorships, community outreach and tax deductible donations.  This is where we need YOUR help to get to Nationals in Boston and proudly represent the University.  As a thank you for your generosity, we have some great incentives and your donation is tax deductible.

 Thank you and GO SPARTANS!


Sincerely,

San Jose State Ice Hockey

What We Need & What You Get

The Spartan’s budget for the National Tournament is about $25,000.  You might wonder where all this money goes? Your generous donation allows us to pay for travel, hotels, ice fees, referee fees, uniforms, trainers etc. 

If you look to the right, you will see the incentives we offer for donating towards our Nationals run.  With these incentives, we try to make it to where the donors feel as if they are a part of the team.  We tend to think of our team as a family, and we would love to have you guys donate and be a part of the San Jose State Ice Hockey Family! 

The Impact

The San Jose State Hockey Team is a group of close knit, hard working, dedicated athletes who deserve this chance at a National Title.  Your donation will have an immediate impact on our players, coaches, and staff and allow us the opportunity to make you proud at  Nationals while  representing  San Jose State University.  The more money we raise, the more successful our trip to Nationals will be this year as it takes the financial pressure off the team allowing us to focus on our National goal.   As we have proven in the past, we deserve to be considered one of the best teams not only in the West, but in the country!  But in order for this to stand true, we need your help to enable us to get to Boston and show the country what we’re made of.  All the money we raise goes towards making the Spartan Ice Hockey family stronger.  GO SPARTANS!

Other Ways You Can Help

We are aware that some people are unable to contribute by donating money, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help the cause!  If you can spread the word and make some noise about our run to nationals on Facebook, Twitter and other social networks we would really appreciate it!

story: Simply put, Otto has recently lost a tooth during his long battle with health issues related to his time serving our country. He has done a lot for our community... let's pay it forward with this surprise gift of funds to get his tooth replaced.

story:
Short Summary

Mispillion River Brewing was born from the love of craft brewing, art in its purest form! We at Mispillion River Brewing desire to continue this art form by brewing the finest craft beer.  In 2011, Co-Founder, Eric Williams, told his wife and Co-Founder, “Megan, I am going to open a craft brewery in Milford!”

After 2 years of planning, brewing (and tasting!!), traveling the country, and assembling a team of partners, we are set to open in the late Fall of 2013. We not only want to open a craft brewery but desire to open the best craft brewery. We will do this by combining the highest quality ingredients of barley, hops, water and yeast. We are targeting the entry level craft drinker, beer connoisseur, craft beer drinker, and the craft brewery enthusiast-that is our focus.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $10,000 to go towards the final construction of our 15 barrel brew house. This funding will enable us to begin producing MORE BEER and open up our tasting room full time for the Milford community!!!

Check out our video for exciting footage of the new equipment and imagine the possibilities along with us!!

If we are not able to reach our goal, all funds contributed will still go towards the final construction of the brew house but it will likely take more time for us to become fully operational (aka produce enough deliscious beer to proudly serve our community)!

 

The Impact

Mispillion River Brewing aims to be recognized by its customers and the brewing industry for producing the highest quality craft beer. We honor craft brewing by using the highest quality ingredients, and strive for the best customer service in the industry.

Craft brewing is a passion and exemplifies the love of life possessed by the MRB crew and the great community it serves.

Cheers!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if your not able to contribute to our cause, please consider supporting us through the purchase of one of the perks highlighted in our campaign. Be one of the first to sport MRB apparrel or consider dedicating a fermenter or bar stool to a friend or fellow beer lover. All proceeds go towards the brewery and will ensure we are able to fully launch the brewery and serve delicious high quality brews!!

Please get the word out, make some noise about the new brewery in Milford; come by and join us for a pint starting November 15th 2013!!

story:
Whenever there is a tremor and a turn in the cases of violence against women, then only we rise from our deep sleep and start raising voice against perpetrators to make them confess their crimes and face the consequences. But till when we will wait to watch the women as sufferers and take action against culprits after ruining the lives of these women.  

The state of safety for Indian women is far below what is expected for such an economic giant. A survey by the Reuters Foundation concluded that India ranks as the 4th most insecure country in the world when it comes to the safety of women.

Acid attack violence against women in India is increasingly becoming rampant despite worldwide condemnation and scrutiny. There have been over 2456 reported cases of acid attacks perpetuated against women from the year 2002 to 2010. This averages to about 273 reported cases of acid burning on an annual basis. This, according to analysts a gross underestimation since there were 494 judicial cases on acid attacks against women in 2002. This is truly, a sad state of affairs.

Other problems of women safety include harassment including unsolicited physical touching. Women cannot walk alone at night without being terribly afraid of being harassed or attacked by their male counterparts.

It is happening in all areas of India i.e. poor and rich neighborhoods, rural and urban areas, Hindu and Muslim dominated regions. Women are simply not safe in India. They have no freedom and therefore no real life.

However, women in India can take back their freedom. They can beat back their male counterparts’ intent on doing them harm. This can be done at multiple levels i.e. individually, as a community, legislatively and nationally in form of women safety advocate groups.

‘Spot of Shame’ is an initiative by Stop Acid Attacks campaign which is envisaged as an event to remark the spots that have witnessed the brutality against women in different parts of India. It is an event of strength; it is the cry of our conscience against our own complacency. Spot of Shame is being organized to remind the battle against gender violence to our citizens.

The 'Spot of Shame' will be marked with a particular stamp, designed by our Mumbai team of eminent film makers and artists, by a graffiti artist on a particular day in every city across the country, starting with Delhi on January 22. The day after the stamp is painted at the 'Spot of Shame', we will hold a brief demonstration and silent protest to explain people about the presence of the stamp. The idea is to send the 'Spot of Shame' marking viral across all big and small cities and towns of the country over a period of time.

To begin with, Stop Acid Attacks will mark the places where girls were burnt with acid.

We come from a time and race, where warriors were respected for scars on their faces and chests. We are now living in a social structure where girls who are scarred because of their 'Firm NO' are bound to live behind veils and walls. This needs to change and with an emergency. Because, we, the people associated with Stop Acid Attacks campaign, are angry with the way our women are being treated. The one who gives birth cannot be and should not be subjected to such inhuman violence anymore in the only country where people call her “Motherland”. We do need to understand that every girl is equally in danger as long as we let our boys grow up into maniacal lovers. Lovers who feel jilted and get trapped and frustrated in the love of a body. We need to act before the definition of love changes here forever.

And if we do not understand why we need these 'Spots of Shame', the men better stop believing their gender, and the women, they may choose not to complain.

And if you do believe in the imminent need, mark your city, your town with a 'Spot of Shame' where a girl was attacked, molested or abused. It is better to live in a society which is largely safe without security than living in a one that requires a policeman on every nook and corner and a law to define punishments for various methods of crime.

We want the nation to introspect, with its head hung low with Shame!

These spots are the remembrance of the brutalized behavior of male in our society. Spot of Shame is the collective voice of ‘No More’.

Estimated Cost on the campaign for it’s 6 acid attack fighters/campaigners who will travel atleast 8 cities to reach at eight different spots. 

Travel Budget: 3000$
Stay of acid attack fighters: 2400$
Art Work: 1600$
Pamphlets: 800$
Local Logistics:  3800$
Volunteer Remunerations: 2000$

Total: 13600$

story:
Summary

From my life experiences and education, I have purposefully developed a systemized approach to discovering, developing, and implementing the visions, dreams, and potential of individuals and organizations. Are you looking to make a significant life change? Feeling stuck in a current situation or in your life in general? Is your business needing a new plan of action? Do you just need a clear vision? I'd like to help you. I am passionate about seeing people reach their full potential in life. I am devoted to seeing your business work for you and your dreams become a reality.

Over the last ten years, I have been studying the facets of human nature, what drives us as people, and how we can live life to the fullest. Utilizing my Business & Economics degree, I have integrated these concepts to work with, guide, and teach people individually, on personal and business levels, and in a classroom setting. 

My technique draws out what people are looking for within themselves. Often times our realities are masked by pseudo-beliefs and experiences that could be causing us to short circuit our potential. My goal is to help you reveal to yourself who you really are and the life you are capable of pursuing and, if you'd like, assist you along your journey.

Clients frequently speak of having a unique clarity of mind and fresh enlightenment of purpose after our sessions. I finally feel like I have the experience and a growing clientele in place to move forward and launch my own business, which has been a dream of mine for some years now.

By contributing to this dream of mine, you will be supporting my venture and investing in your own personal development and growth. I am giving some pretty awesome perks for any level of contribution. 

In addition, your contribution is also allowing me to pursue my bigger dream of creating a simple yet powerfully enlightening, systemized approach to helping humankind develop our potential. My full dream is to grow this business into a respected international firm reaching individuals and businesses in all spheres of society.

What I Need & What You Get

I need to raise $3,300 to fund my initial start up expenses. 

These funds will be used for the following: 

  • Logo & Branding Expenses
  • Legal Expenses 
  • Website Expenses 
  • Office Setup Expenses 
  • Computer & Billing Software

Funds collected from the given perks will go toward these expenses. So check out the perks, and thank you for being a part of my journey!


*Please note that coaching/consulting sessions can be done in person if you are in the Santa Barbara area. Otherwise, they are performed over the phone.

story:
Meet Upstate Atheists

  • We are a group of 250 members. that give back to the community in Spartanburg, South Carolina.
  • We have raised over $2,000 to distribute more than 300 care packages to the homeless, sponsored 15 foster children with gifts for the holidays, adopted a highway, cleaned up the grounds of a local cancer society, assisted with park clean ups, volunteered with habitat for humanity, and more. 
  • We are a non-profit incorporation with the state of South Carolina. However, most of our fundraising requires that we have a 501c3 status.  Something as small as setting up a table at a local store to take in items for the homeless or toys for the unfortunate around the holidays requires this status.
  • Find out more about us by visiting http://www.meetup.com/Upstate-Atheists

Help Us Help Others

How the group and the community will benefit:
  • All donations will be tax deductable.
  • We will have the opportunity to receive more funds by setting up in locations that would otherwise be off limits.
  • We would receive discounts when setting up booths, saving more money for charity.
  • Businesses would be able to donate to our causes.

Thank you for your support!!

story:
About Us

We are Popciety. a social interaction network, entertainment contest and advertising provider based in central New Jersey. Popciety will provide off/online fun and exciting ongoing contests for participants as well as promotional advertising for small or large business use. We are in pursuit of developing an effective contest/promotional structure that is user friendly, superior and unique.

Help us stake our claim as king of contests by contributing to our cause. It is important to us that all of our participants know that our contests are 100% real with real prizes and real local winners. Our Interaction between us and all of our participants and sponsors will continually be important as we grow and gain popularity. By working with you in a partnership, we can continue to stay rooted to our audience.

  • We offer exclusive contests for our friends on Facebook,Twitter,Etc.. ( friend or follow us to be informed ) http://facebook.com/popciety  http://twitter.com/popciety
  • Encouragement and feedback from our participants to communicate prizes that they would like to compete for in future contests.
  • Our contests will be available to all participants nationwide unless specified.
  • We want to make it our overall mission to make as many " Real " winners as we can, take names and have a great time doing it !! :)

Show your support. Give today to say you believe in our entertainment contest crusade and you could be one of our first winners. Your pledge not only puts us closer to our goal, but also shows that we have supporters. As the number of supporters increase, so does our online ranking . Your contribution could be the difference between page 2 or 3, and a home page feature spot. As a perk we will give you codes to our exclusive contests or promotional plans at a discount price! ( See below for more promotional details )

Thank you for your time and attention!


What We Need & What You Get

We are in need of $25,000 US funding for our campaign. All of the money generated from this campaign will go toward operations which includes:

  •  Perfecting the technology infrastructure
  •  Designing of the site/mobile app
  •  Cost of servers to support the activity
  •  Prizes and giveaways
  •  All the other little things needed to get a business started.

For contributing backers, we have designed some great perks that reflect our fun and adventurous business approach. These perks include different classes of contests ranging from $5 - $80. We are also offering beneficial promotional solutions for businesses or organizations if you make larger contributions.

These exclusive contests will only allow members/backers with specific contest codes to participate. As our goals are achieved all contributors will be given details to sign up to become an official member via email. We'll randomly generate a contest code per contribution class that will be sent out to our contest backers for one lucky winner per contest*. These winners will receive the prizes listed and will be asked to have a picture displayed on our " Recent Winners " section of our site with a testimonial.

If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will go towards necessary equipment/maintenance to keep us moving forward while we continue to secure funding for our business. We are determined to make our contests a reality, and we hope you can help us get there. 

* except our $80 for all perk


Your Impact

With your contribution we will be able to offer participants thousands of products, services and brands like Apple, Mc Donald's and Xbox, etc. Not only will you have a chance to win contests, you will also be offered exclusive deals from our sponsors while participating. Everything works together making us all able to benefit from our contests.

 Don't think you're too small to help! You can make an impact for as little as $25.


Call Now and Demo Us

Want to see us in action? Give us a call at 877-467-6712 24/7 and use the codes below to demo both styles of contest play. Select the contest extension then enter either contest run code below.

Use Code 00001 - ( Contest type 1 ) your caller # order is revealed to you when calling in. - You will hear your sequence number.

Use Code 00002 - ( Contest type 2 ) your caller # order is not revealed to you when you call in. - You will not hear your sequence number.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people are unable to contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

You know how it works. Spread the word - please!

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Share this campaign with indiegogo share tools or on your own Facebook, Twitter, etc. account! (Follow us while you're there.)
  • Are you a blogger or journalist? Do you know a blogger or journalist? This sure seems like a fun thing to write about!
  • Don't forget, this campaign doubles as an effective and powerful promotional tool.

Thanks so much for your support!


Get more business with us


 


Some of our Promotional Features


  • Area Targeting (From town/city to nationwide - US)

             


  • Age Restriction - Target participants by age.

  • Audio Ads - We can create a 20 to 30 sec Audio AD for you.

  • Ad Plays - Each plan has a set number of AD Plays. Additional plays can be purchased.

  • Photo in our slideshow (labeled as a backer/supporter) - Select Gold and you'll be in it.

  • Featured as Sponsor W/ Link - When you get featured on our site we will link your image to your page, site, Facebook, Twitter, etc. of choice.

  • Live Call Transfers - After your AD is heard, with a push of a button participants will be connected to you immediately from our hotline. Our hotline notifies you that it's a live caller on the line when you pick up.

  • Voice mail W/notification - If you are unable to receive a live transfer or call it will go to voice mail. You can retrieve it by calling our hotline and entering your pin.

  • SMS Ad Messages (Up to 160 characters) - Send a custom special offer/deal directly to a participant's mobile with a touch of a button.

                                    


  • Exclusive Contest Run Code (Only your Ad will be hear) - Have your own contest code. Post it, tweet it, email it and get people to participate.

  • Promotional Event (NJ only - in our area) - We can host a promotional event for a total of 4 hours. These events must be scheduled and committed to.




Questions & Answers

1.  Can my business use its own greeting, messages and advertisement recordings?

Yes, absolutely! The system has been designed to allow businesses the ability of using their own greetings, SMS messages and complete advertisements. The recording is easily uploaded to the contest system via the web.

2.  Can we have multiple greetings and messages?

Yes, certainly! Our contest have been designed to provide the most flexibility possible. You may select a different greeting and message for each contest. This will allow the greeting and message to be specific to a particular contest or recorded in the voice of the current personality.

3.  Can we track the progress of a contest?

Possibly one of the most attractive features of our contest, is the ability to actually MONITOR a running contest. Our system captures contest statistics as the contest is running and displays the information for you to view on the web. This provides instant feedback of what areas you are currently calling and the interest level in your contest. This information allows you the ability to increase call in response while a contest is still in progress!

The contest data that is captured is available for review, even weeks after running a contest. Armed with this information, your business will have statistics to analyze good and bad timing and experiment with different promotion types.

Now you will KNOW how your contests are really doing!

4.  Can contests be pre-scheduled?

Busy campaign directors will enjoy the advance scheduling flexibility offered by using our automated system. An unlimited number of contests may be scheduled to run at specific times. Each contest may be a different type, have different messages, have different advertising targets and allow for live transfer or voice mail handling. Reports are available on the web to check scheduling and monitor contest progress.

5.  How can we be sure contestants listen to advertising?

Our systems have been designed to ensure callers hear your advertising message in a easy contest verification process BEFORE they hear what number listener they are. This thwarts auto-dialers and ensures better chances for all who call your contest. This helps businesses promote fair contests, especially for your big ticket prizes. We even offer advanced call control features, which can ensure only one entry per contest, etc.

6.  What format sound files are supported?

 Our system supports MP3 files, however, we may not be able to process all possible types.

7.  What happens if a contestant hangs up?

Contestants that hang-up before hearing their contestant sequence number does not count and the system does not increment the sequence number. This prevents auto-dialers from rapid dialing and ensures your advertisers message hits the mark.

For callers that match the selected winning number, our state-of-the-art equipment captures the caller's phone number and displays it on the contest statistics web page. This allows for a call-back, in the event of transfer disconnection or other difficulties.

8.  What equipment do we need to use our contest ?

Two things are required to use the system:
A) Internet access - for pre-scheduling, statistics and reports
B) Dedicated contest telephone - only for transferred contestants

9. Can we block nuisance callers?

Yes, positively! Repetitive winners and nuisance callers can be screened from participating in your contests. A special entry screen is available on the web, that allows you to maintain a list of blocked phone numbers. Callers that are blocked simply receive a busy signal and will be completely unaware they have been blocked. This feature is included at no extra charge.

10. How many contest run codes can we use?

As many as you wish (addt'l fee may apply). Typically a business will use one contest code, but multiple numbers are allowed. Different numbers may be assigned for different contest types.

11. What do we do if we have special contest requirements?

Simply call us! We are always ready to find a way to make new and exciting contest ideas work.

12. We already have a contest number - can it be used with your contest?

Yes! Just use our call-forwarding feature to use your existing business numbers!

story:
Help Support Home-Based Business, Ivy Soapworks and Candleworks

We have been making homemade soap since 1999.  Every cottage business needs a place to offer their wares.  In addition to internet sales, we’ve have had booths at several Renaissance Festivals across the US.  A few years ago, we sold our booths, and entered semi-retirement.

Since that time, we have had many requests to return.  We discovered that retirement is not all it is cracked up to be.  We have greatly missed the fun, the camaraderie, and the one–to-one interactions with our customers. We think there’s no better way to spend a sunny fall afternoon than cutting soap, listening to live bagpipe music, and interacting with all those who wander into our shop.

This year, we were offered a unique opportunity to come out of our semi-retirement and buy a booth at the Kansas City Renaissance Festival, just in time for their 2014 season, which runs:

August 30th - October 13th • Open Weekends and Labor Day
10am - 7pm •  Rain or Shine
Open Columbus Day, October 13th from 10am - 5pm 

We were thrilled to accept.  Then, the reality of what we had agreed to do set in.  Starting from zero and filling an entire booth for a massive show like KC is a staggering amount of work.  It costs, a lot.  The work we can handle. We enjoy the challenge.  The money is where things get difficult. Normally, we would save money over the course of the year to fund a large show, budgeting in bulk amounts of supplies, booth payments, and fees.  The surprise gift of rejoining the crafters at KC has stretched the limits of our budget.  We need help to get started.  Once we do, the profits from each season will pay the preparation costs of the one following.

Our goal is $12,000. 

That is going to help us:

  • Purchase a booth—this is the largest expense.

  • Buy bulk Soap and Candle Supplies

  • Pay assorted fees

  • Buy all the miscellaneous necessities-bags, labels, paint, booth decorations, bottles, etc.

Perks

  • Every donor gets thanked on the Ivy Soapworks Facebook page (unless you wish to remain anonymous).

  • $20 donations get a bar of soap and a thank you on our Facebook page (unless you wish to remain anonymous).

  • $100 donations get a gift basket (up to a $25 value) and a thank you on our Facebook page (unless you wish to remain anonymous).

  • $1000 donations get a season pass to the Kansas City Renaissance Festival, a very loud and public presentation of the Holy Bath Scepter of Cleanliness outside of our booth on your first visit, a gift basket (up to a $35 value), and a thank you on our Facebook page (unless you wish to remain anonymous).

What happens if we don’t reach our goal?

Ivy Soapworks is committed to being at the Faire this year.  If we do not reach our $12,000 goal, we will not have a permanent location.  We have a fantastic spot picked out for this year.  It is easy to find, convenient, and ideally suited to our needs.  Without full funding we might have to change location, or go from a booth to a tent.  We will have inventory, but not as much as we would like.  Your favorite scents might sell out, only to reappear a week or two later.  We are planning on expanding our line and adding some new scents.  That would not happen if we are not fully funded. We will still have bad jokes on our Soap Opera Sign, but they might not be as funny.

Why Help Ivy Soapworks? 

You have a budget just like us.  When you buy something new, you know just how much you can spend.  You know where your money goes.  Ours goes to the same places.  When you buy a bar of soap from us, the profit we make pays our mortgage, groceries, and utilities.  You are helping other individuals like yourself cover the expenses of life. Home-based businesses expand and stabilize the economy. Your support allows the middle class to flourish, improving the lives of normal people.  You aren’t making the rich richer.

Ivy Soapworks had a successful Renaissance Festival career for 10 years.  We bought 2 booths, and built another before our semi-retirement.  During that time we won awards, gave interviews, appeared in publications and blogs, and heard “you are the best soap ever” many times over.  We’ve been invited to sell at other Faires in California, Arizona, Oklahoma, Texas, Ohio, and New York.  Selling soap at Faires is not just what we do; it’s what we’re best at.  It took semi-retirement to drive that point home.  Help us grow.

Money isn’t the only way you can contribute.  We also need everyone to spread the news that Ivy Soapworks is coming back to the Kansas City Renaissance Festival.  Post it on Facebook, Text it, Tweet it, email it to your entire address book.  Share this campaign with everyone you know.

Thanks so much for your support.  We can’t wait to see all our old friends again, and we’re really excited to meet all the new ones.

those who wander into our shop. 
This year, we were offered a unique opportunity to
come out of our semi-retirement and buy a booth at the Kansas City Renaissance
Festival, just in time for their 2014 season, which runs: August 30th - October 13th • Open Weekends and Labor Day  10am - 7pm •  Rain or Shine Open Columbus Day, October 13th from  10am - 5pm We were thrilled to
accept.  Then, the reality of what we had
agreed to do set in.  Starting from zero
and filling an entire booth for a massive show like KC is a staggering amount of
work.  It costs, a lot.  The work we can handle. We enjoy the
challenge.  The money is where things get
difficult. Normally, we would save money over the course of the year to fund a
large show, budgeting in bulk amounts of supplies, booth payments, and
fees.  The surprise gift of rejoining the
crafters at KC has stretched the limits of our budget.  We need help to get started.  Once we do, the profits from each season will
pay the preparation costs of the one following. 
Our goal is $12,000.  
That is going to help us:

Purchase a booth—this is the largest
expense.
Buy bulk Soap and Candle Supplies
Pay assorted fees
Buy all the miscellaneous
necessities-bags, labels, paint, booth decorations, bottles, etc.
Perks

Every donor gets thanked on the Ivy
Soapworks Facebook page (unless you wish to remain anonymous).
$20 donations get a bar of soap and
a thank you on our Facebook page (unless you wish to remain anonymous).
$100 donations get a gift basket (up
to a $25 value) and a thank you on our Facebook page (unless you wish to remain
anonymous).
$1000 donations get a season pass to
the Kansas City Renaissance Festival, a very loud and public presentation of
the Holy Bath Scepter of Cleanliness outside of our booth on your first visit,
a gift basket (up to a $35 value), and a thank you on our Facebook page (unless
you wish to remain anonymous).
What happens if we don’t reach our
goal?
Ivy Soapworks is committed to being
at the Faire this year.  If we do not
reach our $12,000 goal, we will not have a permanent location.  We have a fantastic spot picked out for this
year.  It is easy to find, convenient,
and ideally suited to our needs.  Without
full funding we might have to change location, or go from a booth to a tent.  We will have inventory, but not as much as we
would like.  Your favorite scents might
sell out, only to reappear a week or two later. 
We are planning on expanding our line and adding some new scents.  That would not happen if we are not fully
funded. We will still have bad jokes on
our Soap Opera Sign, but they might not be as funny. 
Why Help Ivy Soapworks?  
You have a budget just like us.  When you buy something new, you know just how
much you can spend.  You know where your
money goes.  Ours goes to the same places.  When you buy a bar of soap from us, the
profit we make pays our mortgage, groceries, and utilities.  You are helping other individuals like
yourself cover the expenses of life. Home-based
businesses expand and stabilize the economy. Your support allows the middle
class to flourish, improving the lives of normal people.  You aren’t making the rich richer.
Ivy Soapworks had a successful Renaissance
Festival career for 10 years.  We bought
2 booths, and built another before our semi-retirement.  During that time we won awards, gave
interviews, appeared in publications and blogs, and heard “you are the best soap
ever” many times over.  We’ve been
invited to sell at other Faires in California, Arizona, Oklahoma, Texas, Ohio, and
New York.  Selling soap at Faires is not
just what we do; it’s what we’re best at. 
It took semi-retirement to drive that point home.  Help us grow.
Money isn’t the only way you can
contribute.  We also need everyone to
spread the news that Ivy Soapworks is coming back to the Kansas City
Renaissance Festival.  Post it on
Facebook, Text it, Tweet it, email it to your entire address book.  Share this campaign with everyone you know.

Thanks so much for your support.  We can’t wait to see all our old friends
again, and we’re really excited to meet all the new ones.

story:
SHORT SUMMARY

My name is Michael Thomas and I grew up in Milwaukee, Wisconsin in a single family household.  I grew up in a neighborhood where I did not see many people going off to college and building a professional career. I was blessed to have been around people who cared about the children in our community and wanted to see them make something of themselves. Summers were brutal back then , because if you weren't apart of any activities, then you were gang banging, experimenting with drugs or doing other criminal activity that would eventually make you apart of the prison system, especially for young men. In my case I was involved with places like the Boys and Girls club, Warning basketball tournaments, whose model was " We must RESPECT each other" and most importantly The Junior Bridgeman Annual basketball camp for kids. The opportunity to actually meet a professional athlete and professional people, teaching children how to work together as a team and opening our eyes to see that we too can achieve success was something that stuck with me forever.

I'm forever thankful to all of the projects mentioned above, because they kept us out of trouble and challenged our young minds to be different and want something out of life. As I grew older I found that this had a bigger impact on me than I had originally thought. I finally found my purpose through God on this earth: my life's mission to help mentor and educate as many children and young adults as I can. It's important to show these kids positive possibilities in this world that's there for them, if we (Adults) just guide and expose them to it.

For this reason my wife Angelick Thomas, our business partner Torry Pitts, along with myself founded United Faith Community Service Incorporated, to change the course of history for as many children and young adults as possible. I believe firmly that it's our calling to ensure that the children we encounter receive the opportunities and the services they need in order to succeed in their lives.  We want to give HOPE.

We desire to show children all of the opportunities that are available to them through exposure and mentorship.  Our children are growing up in a world that is becoming  increasingly more violent and fewer children have the hope of living to become productive adults in our society because of the lack of role models and mentors in their lives. We want that to CHANGE.

What We Need

The funds that we raise will go towards hiring directors and mentors for the youth.  We will also utilize the funds to take children in our programs to various community events. We plan to partner with various youth camps that are geared towards exposing underprivileged children to other opportunities, such as a rodeo camp we identified, music museums, meditation lessons and nature outings. Our organization will show them the importance of taking care of our planet, so that we all can live healthier lives. We can't do this without your HELP.

We also will be hosting weekend events for the kids where we bring in community leaders and celebrities that will share with them on how they beat the odds to succeed in their own lives. Positive EXPOSURE.

Other Ways You Can Help

 We plan to expand our project throughout the country. Please share our campaign with others to spread the word about our work. If you are in the metro Phoenix area and want to participate in the work we are doing- please let us know!  By mail at 14955 W. Bell Road, P.O. Box 9044 Surprise, Arizona 85374, by phone at 602-348-3544, on Twitter at @unitedfaith07 or email us at Unitedfaith07.aeb@gmail.com. Help us help others. Thank you.

All donations are tax deductible.
