story:
Imagine, that your washing machine, fridge, television or any other things in the house get broken and you want to fix them, since they are not so old that you should replace them with new ones.

Any other example? Your garbage disposal is clogged, faucet is broken, short circuit problem with an electrical socket, or your car gets broken and you are left alone on the roadside in other city or even country and there is nobody you know.

All these things have one thing in common and that is their solution. In most cases, a person sits down at a computer or picks up the phone and begins to search services, repair stores and does all things necessary, which takes over half an hour sometimes.

However, you can solve any of these problems with this application and just in a few seconds.

Let´s have another example. You are left alone with your broken car on the roadside, 500 km from home and the nearest cities are 40 km away from you. You simply choose a car service in this application, you select your current location, distance 50 km and IGS will show you a list of all available car services within a radius of 50 km. Then, just one click and service or all shown services will get your information like name, phone number, current location and short info- broken car. 
This service will receive your request and accept it with just one click and since they already have all information and location about you, they will send you a help. You are able to arrange and manage all of this and even more with IGS in a very short time.



Every user, who creates an account on IGS platform will be able to use it as a social network with common features. However, we want to expand IGS of functions, that will improve communication between users and companies, such as videochat, calling through a mobile network, a bazaar, targeted ads based on user´s interests ( option to disable ads), saving your own C.V. and then searching for job offers that meet job requirements, different kinds of discounts and much more.

What makes IGS different from others? It is its ability to deal promptly with problems and emergencies. The users will no longer have to search companies, services and contact them, since this may be very annoying and take a lot of time. IGS will contact all business and services that you need in your area or in a selected location.

All users can also add and create a company account and a public company profile to their current account, which will be available for all users of IGS platform. Besides the fact, that your company will get noticed and visible, you will get access to various contracts, that other companies entered in the system, you will get access to C.V. of users, who are qualified and interested to work in your sector, CMS system, the possibility of billing, creating of targeted ads and offers, that will not unnecessarily appear to users with different range of interest, enter various discounts, which will be presented in IGS by form of Discount portal and much more functions.


What you can find on IGS platform:


view ...           

Thanks to your help and ideas, IGS will be fully adapted to the requirements of user who will be able to choose and set everything that he will need the application for. The basic application available for the current user and the company can be supplemented with those downloadable additional modules, that you want to use, so you will avoid having many icons and functions that you will never need and use on user´s desktop. IGS will be also an open system, in which the users will be able to create their own modules or customize the design of platform.


The greatest challenge for our team will be fast and stable working of IGS application. It means, that we need to create servers, that will be able to work fast and reliably despite a high load. At the beginning, we also need to provide enough of storage space for databases and files of users. Every contribution will help, so the application will use the highest quality servers with sufficient storage space and it will provide you with the highest quality services.


IGOSIMPLE will be the application, which will support international databases. Since this is not a small project and it requires considerable funds, we decided to fund the start-up through crowdfunding.

Why Indiegogo? In our opinion, it is one of the best, if not the best of all crowdfunding websites on the internet and it has already supported many projects, which are successful.

For us, this is not only the opportunity to run this project but also it is a very good way how to promote ourselves and remain independent.

As we would like to run this project together with people, we will be very grateful if they contribute financially, but they are also welcome to contribute their ideas and suggestions to IGS project. You can share your ideas on our website www.igosimple.com           

YOUR SUPPORT AND OPINION ARE IMPORTANT TO US.

Thank you. 




If we do not reach our goal:

We start working on project.
Release time is approx. 10-12 months because we work on this project alongside our main job.
Project will be made as website with these modules:
USER - Profile, Friends, Chat, Messaging, Events,
Company - Profile, Contacts, Chat, Messaging, References, Invoicing, Advertising
there will be also available selectable modules such as
Calls, Pass Manager, Wallet, Calendar, Discounts, Product list,E-shop,Demand,Services,Freelance,Jobs,etc.
After launch we will add more features that we have done.
The production will be slower and we cannot answer all of your questions because we miss more people in crew.

Website will be only in English language and later we will make more localizations. (You can send us your opinion which language you want on website.)

Website will be in closed development. We send registration link only for donors and participants in our competitions.

If we reach our 550 000€ goal:

We work on project in full time with crew of ten people.
Whole project will be available as website and Android, iOS, Windows mobile applications.
Planned release time is in April 2015
We open pre-registrations and you can send your ideas through our website form. You get access to track the website development and send us your comments.
Application will include all modules mentioned before and plus some more useful modules. You can also help to develop new modules for our project. All, website and applications will be available in English, German, Spanish, Italian, French and Russian language.

We will build and run our own servers and data-storages which will help us provide stable and faster connection.


If we reach more than 550 000€ goal ???

We get more people to our crew.
We select some of your ideas and include them in application before launch day.
We will be working harder to respond all of your inquiries and provide you with good support.
All, website and applications will be available in alpha and beta for closed testing. (Only for supporters)
Release date is around February - March 2015.
All modules will include more detailed Content Management System and more options to set up your account for your needs.
We select more languages from your ideas and raise number of available localizations. (6 startup languages plus we select some or all from your ideas)
For basic users we provide more storage for photos and we add a video chat right into your application.
Personal setup of your account will be more accurate, which help you to find all information in our network. 
We setup new servers for USA, Europe and Asia and also we setup bigger data-storage. 
We add next layer of security and rebuild server structure for better,faster and stable connectivity.
Before launch date we setup calls for mobile operators and you will be able to add phone number to your application account so you can call from your PC or app directly to any other phone number anywhere in the world.
- 5% reduced prices on all paid services and for monthly fees for all users.

Our future plans if we raise enough donations:

We want to open our app for you and you can make your own modules and your own designs.
Application localizations will be open so you can translate whole application and modules create dictionary and more.
We want to sync our app with WordPress, Joomla and Drupal so

you can export all your data from your website into our app
and many more ...


All ideas and suggestions are really appreciated and we get closer look to each of them.


All contributions received from you will be used for successful start-up of IGS project. Since there is a huge amount of data, it is not possible to rent data storage and servers. Therefore, we need to provide our own servers and data storage which is about 20% of grants collected. The rest of the finances will be redistributed to development of website and applications, to all necessary equipment and to the wages for the programmer and support crew.

Graph shows how we will use money if we reach our target.





After your donation of 110€ or more please send us email what combination and size of t-shirt you are interested in. Thank you.
Thanks board will contain the names of all donors. 
We will instal our THANKS board on wall in our office entrance.
After the campaign we will share photos so that you could see the name of each donor.

And to prove you that we want you to help us make IGS live check our website for first competitions.

igosimple.com    




With IGS you can almost instantly solve many problems, e.g. you can find services if you are stuck on a road with a broken car or other services like accommodation, towing services and many, many more around your current location.
You can simply find what you need to do with IGS. For example, you need to paint the rooms, find a babysitter, find the cleaning services or you just need to find a job and many other.
No matter where you are and what you need, with IGS you will find help right in your place. You can make dealings like freelancer,
check the demands of other companies, make calls, organize meetings, find jobs or find employees for your company, invoicing,
using discounts, creating targeted ads or simple be a part of community with all features like chat, friends, messaging or sharing your photos.


We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project through Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!
If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at balko@igosimple.com or masse@igosimple.com.
